translation.en: [female radio host] It's 75 degrees in sunny San Diego,
translation.zh: 阳光明媚的圣地亚哥 现在气温24度

translation.en: and the number one song of the day is still "Blush" by Koop.
translation.zh: 今日排名首位的歌曲依旧是库普的《脸红》

translation.en: ♪ I feel your eyes on me ♪
translation.zh: 我感到你正看着我

translation.en: ♪ You should know better… ♪
translation.zh: 你不该如此天真

translation.en: Whoo!
translation.zh: 你试图将我撵走

translation.en: ♪ You put on the pressure ♪
translation.zh: 可算是给足了压力

translation.en: ♪ Something tells me I, I should not let go… ♪
translation.zh: 某种感觉告诉我 我不该就此放手

translation.en: Whoo! It's my birthday! It's my birthday!
translation.zh: 某种感觉告诉我 我不知道 今天是我的生日！

translation.en: ♪ I've been working hard… ♪
translation.zh: 我一直在努力 想让你看到

translation.en: Whoo! Here we go! Here we go! Here we go!
translation.zh: 我一直在努力 想让你看到 你有多让我着迷…

translation.en: Yeah! Whoo!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: It's an impromptu dance party with my best friend since first grade!
translation.zh: 跟我从一年级起就最要好的朋友来场即兴热舞派对！

translation.en: -Because it's your birthday! -[both screaming]
translation.zh: 今天是你的生日！

translation.en: Go, go. Work, work. Drop it low. Oh.
translation.zh: 用力跳 扭起来 压低腰

translation.en: I love this song, but I'm very hungry.
translation.zh: 这首歌我很爱 可我肚子太饿了

translation.en: Okay, I need your help.
translation.zh: 好了 我需要你帮个忙

translation.en: Question. What do you think? Quarter-life chic? Or quarter-life crisis?
translation.zh: 问你啊 你觉得这身怎么样？是青年时尚呢？还是青年危机？

translation.en: Huh. Well, right now, you're matching the lamp, so…
translation.zh: 你这身跟台灯挺配的 所以嘛…

translation.en: -Would a hat help? -[chuckles] No.
translation.zh: -戴顶帽子会好点吗？-没用的

translation.en: Rude!
translation.zh: 真无礼！

translation.en: -Here. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -给-谢谢

translation.en: Okay, for my Cassie-palooza kickoff night, we are gonna start off at the club
translation.zh: 好了 凯茜狂欢周的开幕 我们先从夜店开始

translation.en: where I've spent all afternoon decorating the VIP area.
translation.zh: 我已经花了一整个下午把贵宾区都布置好了

translation.en: -Hey, I have this crazy idea. -[mouth full] I'm listening.
translation.zh: 喂 我突发奇想哦 -洗耳恭听-与其跑外头去过你的生日

translation.en: Instead of going out for your birthday, what if we just stay home,
translation.zh: -洗耳恭听-与其跑外头去过你的生日 不如我们就待在家里一起穿上弹力裤

translation.en: and we put on our stretchy pants, and we puzzle like we used to,
translation.zh: 不如我们就待在家里一起穿上弹力裤 我们还像以前那样玩拼图然后点一些外卖面条？

translation.en: and we order more noodles?
translation.zh: 我们还像以前那样玩拼图然后点一些外卖面条？

translation.en: No, no. We're not staying in. It's my birthday week.
translation.zh: 我们可不能待在家里这是我的生日周啊

translation.en: I have to ring in 25 with style!
translation.zh: 我25岁了 必须开个潇洒的头才行！

translation.en: You've rung in the past four years with style. One night in won't kill you.
translation.zh: 过去四年你年年都开得很潇洒就一晚而已 不会死人的

translation.en: Besides, we haven't puzzled in weeks. I mean, look at Mona.
translation.zh: 而且啊 我们已经好几周没玩拼图了 瞧瞧蒙娜 她的微笑都不见了这样怪郁闷的

translation.en: She is missing her smile, and it's kind of depressing.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧蒙娜 她的微笑都不见了这样怪郁闷的

translation.en: I'm not bailing on my kickoff party. It is tradition. My friends expect this.
translation.zh: 好吧 我可不能错过自己的开幕派对 这可是传统 我的朋友们都期待着呢

translation.en: Well, your best friend has a huge week ahead of her.
translation.zh: 可对你最要好的朋友来说下周非常重要

translation.en: I was just added as one of the junior research assistants
translation.zh: 我刚作为初级研究助理

translation.en: on a team studying marsupial fossil teeth.
translation.zh: 加入有袋类动物化石牙齿的研究小组

translation.en: I don't fully understand what that means, but congratulations! [squeals]
translation.zh: 虽然我不能完全明白这什么意思 但恭喜你呀！

translation.en: I'm one of three assistants, so it's really not a big--
translation.zh: 我只是三个助理中的一个所以其实也没什么了不起…

translation.en: No, no! It is a big deal. You should celebrate.
translation.zh: 不！这很了不起 你应该庆祝一下

translation.en: Because guess what? Tonight is… [singsong] …a celebration!
translation.zh: 因为啊 你猜怎么着？今晚正适合庆祝！

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna go change. Again.
translation.zh: 我还得再换身衣服试试

translation.en: So should you. Tonight'll be fun, I promise.
translation.zh: 你也去换一身今晚肯定会很好玩 我保证

translation.en: We leave in an hour-ish.
translation.zh: 再过一小时左右就出发

translation.en: Love you, my bestie since we were six!
translation.zh: 爱你哦 我六岁就认识的好闺蜜！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Whoo! Did I tell you how cute you look by the way?
translation.zh: 我跟你说过你有多好看吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I think you did, like, 19 times. Got it.
translation.zh: 你好像说过了 大概有19次 听到了

translation.en: Good. I meant it every single time. You look adorable.
translation.zh: 那就好 我每句都是真心的你看起来真是可爱死了

translation.en: -I love this dress on you. -Thank you. So, who's coming tonight?
translation.zh: 谢谢你 凯茜 今晚都有谁会来啊？

translation.en: Okay. So Kayla's coming. Maddie's coming.
translation.zh: 是这样的 凯拉会来 玛迪会来

translation.en: Moving in?
translation.zh: 在搬家呢？

translation.en: Oh, hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Of course you're moving in. I don't know why I just said that.
translation.zh: 你很显然是在搬家我都不知道我干嘛要问这个

translation.en: Hi, we're your neighbors.
translation.zh: 嗨 我们是你的邻居

translation.en: I'm Cassie, and my quiet but highly intelligent roommate is--
translation.zh: 我叫凯茜而我这位恬静却聪慧绝顶的室友叫…

translation.en: Lisa. Lisa.
translation.zh: 丽莎

translation.en: Um, I'm around dinosaur bones all day,
translation.zh: 我整天都在跟恐龙骨头打交道

translation.en: so I'm not really used to talking to people that much.
translation.zh: 所以呢 我不是很适应跟人聊天

translation.en: -Right. -Works in the Museum of Natural History.
translation.zh: -是哦-她在自然历史博物馆工作

translation.en: Oh wow! Yeah, I compose music for video games all day,
translation.zh: 是啊 我整天都在给电子游戏做音乐

translation.en: so not a lot of human interaction for me either.
translation.zh: 所以我也不怎么跟人接触

translation.en: Sorry, I'm Max, by the way.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我叫麦克斯

translation.en: Ordinarily, I'd shake your hand, but I'd almost certainly drop this,
translation.zh: 通常我是应该要跟你们握个手 但那样的话 这就肯定要掉地上了

translation.en: um, and I desperately need these dishes.
translation.zh: 我现在非常需要这些盘子

translation.en: -Oh! Here. Let me open the door for you. -Brilliant. Cool.
translation.zh: -来 我帮你开门-太好了 好

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Okay, we've gotta go, but, um, welcome to the neighborhood, Max.
translation.zh: 好 我们得走了欢迎你住到这儿来 麦克斯

translation.en: -Yeah, thanks. See ya. -Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: -嗯 谢谢 回头见-嗯

translation.en: -Oh, don't give me that look. -What look? I wasn't giving a look.
translation.zh: -别那样看着我-怎样看着你啊 我才没有呢

translation.en: -You wanna play matchmaker? -I didn't say that.
translation.zh: -你想当红娘吗？-我可没这么说

translation.en: Since you mentioned it, I did notice a spark.
translation.zh: 既然你说了我刚才确实发现擦出了火花

translation.en: -There was a spark? -Mm!
translation.zh: 有火花吗？

translation.en: No, there was no spark.
translation.zh: 不 根本没有火花

translation.en: I'm… I'm really focused on work right now, and I can't have any distractions.
translation.zh: 我现在必须把心思全放在工作上 可不能被别的东西分心了

translation.en: Not even in the form of our new neighbor and his cute accent?
translation.zh: 即便是我们的新邻居和他那可爱的口音也不行？

translation.en: I'm not like you.
translation.zh: 我跟你可不一样

translation.en: -Okay. -No, no!
translation.zh: -哦-不是！

translation.en: I just mean you can juggle a social life. That's not me.
translation.zh: 我的意思是你能兼顾社交生活我没这个本事

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm a party planner. It's built into the job.
translation.zh: 毕竟我是派对策划人可以说这是工作的一部分

translation.en: Well, I'm on a path here.
translation.zh: 嗯 我现在算走上了工作的正道

translation.en: Nail this junior research position, get promoted to field researcher,
translation.zh: 做好这个初级研究的职位晋升为实地研究员

translation.en: and then work alongside my paleontologist hero.
translation.zh: 然后就能跟我古生物学界的偶像并肩工作了

translation.en: Hey, I wanna introduce you to my friend Fun.
translation.zh: 对了 我一直想给你介绍个朋友它叫“休闲”

translation.en: I don't know if you two have ever met.
translation.zh: 我感觉你俩还从没见过面呢

translation.en: [Lisa] Let me get through all of this stuff first, okay?
translation.zh: 让我先把这些事处理完 好吗？

translation.en: Downward Dad is out of control. He posts a different pose every day.
translation.zh: “下犬爹”简直是失了控他每天都要发一个新动作

translation.en: -[chuckles] I liked his flying crow. -Okay, do not encourage him.
translation.zh: -我挺喜欢他的飞鸦式的-喂 别鼓励他好吗？

translation.en: What? Wait. It's not just me. Do you see how many people like his yoga studio?
translation.zh: 不只我而已 你看到有多少人赞了他的瑜伽工作室吗？

translation.en: Oh, I know. I've heard from everyone how amazing his classes are.
translation.zh: 噢 能不知道吗？是个人都跟我说他的课有多棒

translation.en: We should take one.
translation.zh: 我们应该去上一堂

translation.en: No, I'm good.
translation.zh: 不用了

translation.en: I got enough secondhand yoga from him growing up that I am centered for life.
translation.zh: 从小到大我已经从他那里吸了太多的二手瑜伽 够我天人合一一辈子了

translation.en: I think it's sweet that he's on social media.
translation.zh: 我觉得他上社交媒体挺可爱的

translation.en: It's like he's trying to connect with you.
translation.zh: 看来他是想和你多沟通

translation.en: Yeah, I love him, but he's my dad, not my buddy.
translation.zh: 对 我爱他 但他是我爸 不是我朋友

translation.en: I'm fine with our lives being separate.
translation.zh: 我不介意我们的生活没有交集

translation.en: Okay. Well, if you just left one comment, it would probably make his day.
translation.zh: 好吧 但要是你能留个言的话他肯定会很开心的

translation.en: Fine. I'll throw him a like, but no comment. -You happy? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 好吧 我就给他点个赞但留言就算了 满意了吧？

translation.en: [Lisa] So this is, like, our 19th Cassie-palooza kickoff.
translation.zh: 这好像是我们第19个凯茜狂欢周的开幕了

translation.en: [Cassie] It's gonna be the best ever!
translation.zh: 肯定会是有史以来最棒的！

translation.en: Hey, Bob.
translation.zh: 嘿 鲍勃

translation.en: Good evening, Cassie.
translation.zh: 晚上好 凯茜

translation.en: -Thank you. -Ladies, welcome.
translation.zh: -谢谢你咯-女士们 欢迎光临

translation.en: She's my favorite person. I love her so much.
translation.zh: 她是我最喜欢的人 我真是太爱她了

translation.en: [man] Cassie's here!
translation.zh: 凯茜到了！

translation.en: -Wow. This is actually really pretty. -Hi!
translation.zh: -这里还真挺漂亮的-嗨！

translation.en: -[woman] Happy birthday, Cassie! -[Cassie] Whoo!
translation.zh: 生日快乐 凯茜！

translation.en: [man 2] Happy birthday! It's so good to see you.
translation.zh: 生日快乐！ -很高兴见到你-今天不是我生日 杰里米

translation.en: It's not my birthday, Jeremy. Not my birthday.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-今天不是我生日 杰里米

translation.en: You are the best!
translation.zh: 你们最棒了！

translation.en: [screams] Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: [man] Cassie! Drink, drink, drink!
translation.zh: 凯茜！喝！

translation.en: -["Blush" by Koop playing] -[gasps] It's our song. -It's Koop! -Yeah.
translation.zh: -这是我们的歌 是库普-对

translation.en: -We have to dance! -[Lisa] Okay.
translation.zh: -我们必须去跳个舞！-好

translation.en: Come on! Come on!
translation.zh: 快来！

translation.en: Go, girl! Go, girl! Go, go! Break it down. Break it down.
translation.zh: 加油 姐妹！跳起来

translation.en: Go, Lisa! Go, Lisa!
translation.zh: 加油 丽莎！

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 好哎！

translation.en: [woman 2] Yes, Cassie!
translation.zh: 真棒 凯茜！

translation.en: I'm flying!
translation.zh: 我在飞！

translation.en: Careful! You're gonna get hurt.
translation.zh: 小心点！你会受伤的

translation.en: -[crowd chanting] Drink! Drink! -Here! It's your birthday!
translation.zh: 喝！

translation.en: Should I do it? Should I do it? Okay.
translation.zh: 我要喝吗？要喝吗？好吧

translation.en: -[crowd chanting] More! More! More! More! -Oh yeah!
translation.zh: 再喝！

translation.en: -[Cassie] So much fun! You! -[woman] You kept drinking shots.
translation.zh: 真是太好玩了！ -你啊！-你刚才一直不停灌烈酒

translation.en: Because you kept handing them to me!
translation.zh: 因为你一直递给我啊！

translation.en: You're crazy! You're-- I can't keep up with you.
translation.zh: 你太疯了！我没办法跟你拼酒

translation.en: Okay, you guys, next stop is Roddy's house.
translation.zh: 好了 下一站是罗迪家

translation.en: I rented a waterslide that goes from the roof into his pool!
translation.zh: 我租了个水上滑梯从屋顶上一路滑到他的泳池里！

translation.en: What's wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: You're bailing, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你要提前闪了 对吧？

translation.en: I bet you no one would notice if we snuck back home right now.
translation.zh: 我打赌要是我们现在偷偷回家去没有人会注意到的

translation.en: I would notice!
translation.zh: 我会注意到啊！

translation.en: You know that these people are terrible, right?
translation.zh: 你知道这些人都不怎么样 对吧？

translation.en: They're just trying to have a good time, which is exactly what you should be doing!
translation.zh: 他们只是想玩个痛快这正是你应该做的事！来吧！

translation.en: -Come on. -I like having a good time too.
translation.zh: 我也喜欢痛快地玩

translation.en: Only I wanna do it
translation.zh: 只不过我要玩的话

translation.en: with people who'd actually care if something happened to me,
translation.zh: 会找那些真正在乎我不想看到我出事的人

translation.en: or who would like me even if I didn't rent a very dangerous waterslide.
translation.zh: 那些就算我没有租一个非常危险的水上滑梯 也会喜欢我的人

translation.en: Don't tell me you're jealous.
translation.zh: 别告诉我你是嫉妒了

translation.en: I am not jealous of people who look filtered 24/7.
translation.zh: 我可不会嫉妒这种7天24小时都自带滤镜的人

translation.en: [under breath] I don't know! Kinda sounds like you're jealous to me!
translation.zh: 这话听起来就像是嫉妒哦！

translation.en: -[woman] Come on, Cassie, let's go! -[laughing] Okay, one second!
translation.zh: -快点 凯茜 我们走！-好的 等一下

translation.en: You know, you're different when you're with them.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 跟他们在一起时你像变了个人似的

translation.en: [Cassie] I'm what?
translation.zh: 我怎么了？

translation.en: It's like you think you aren't worth anything if you aren't seen.
translation.zh: 就好像如果不被人看到你就没有任何价值似的

translation.en: Well, at least I'm out making friends, and I'm not hiding at my desk.
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着 至少我有跑出来交朋友 而不是躲在自己桌子后面

translation.en: Because I think that there is more to life than partying
translation.zh: 因为我认为人生的意义不仅仅是吃喝玩乐

translation.en: or knowing all the names of bartenders in town.
translation.zh: 或是记住全镇每个酒保的名字

translation.en: Here we go! My life isn't as important because it's social.
translation.zh: 又来了 我的人生没那么重要因为我有社交

translation.en: Just because I'm not one of your science friends
translation.zh: 我不是你那些搞科学的朋友

translation.en: doesn't mean I don't work hard.
translation.zh: 不代表我就不努力工作

translation.en: -I didn't say that! -But you meant it!
translation.zh: -我没这么说-你就是这个意思！

translation.en: I see how you only pretend to be interested
translation.zh: 我看得出来每当我告诉你我策划了什么活动时

translation.en: when I tell you about some event I planned
translation.zh: 你只是假装有兴趣

translation.en: or your offhanded comments about how I'm never home.
translation.zh: 你老是假装不经意地抱怨我总不在家什么的

translation.en: Like you don't pretend to understand my life?
translation.zh: 说得好像你就不假装你理解我的生活？

translation.en: Tell me what I do.
translation.zh: 说说看 我是干什么的

translation.en: You work at the museum.
translation.zh: 你在博物馆里工作

translation.en: But what do I do there?
translation.zh: 我在那里具体做什么？

translation.en: I don't know. I don't understand that stuff.
translation.zh: 我哪知道？我又不懂你那些玩意！

translation.en: And I don't understand your stuff.
translation.zh: 我也不懂你的这些玩意

translation.en: [scoffs, chuckles wryly] Classic.
translation.zh: 真经典

translation.en: We never hang out anymore.
translation.zh: 我们好久没一起玩了

translation.en: Just the two of us.
translation.zh: 就我们俩

translation.en: We're busy. We'll just have to get better at making time for each other.
translation.zh: 我们都忙啊 我们要学一下该怎么样留出时间给对方

translation.en: I don't know, Cassie. I don't think being friends should feel like work.
translation.zh: 我不知道 凯茜 我… 我认为做朋友不该感觉像工作一样累

translation.en: I don't think it does, Lisa.
translation.zh: 我也这么认为 丽莎

translation.en: But I can tell from your face that you do.
translation.zh: 但我能从你脸上看出 你有这种感觉

translation.en: It's fine.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: I don't wanna stay best friends out of habit anyway.
translation.zh: 反正我也不想因为习惯才保持好朋友的关系

translation.en: I'm a habit?
translation.zh: 我就是个习惯而已？

translation.en: Th-- That's it? You're just gonna say something like that and walk away?
translation.zh: 就这样？你打算撂下这种话然后拍拍屁股走掉？

translation.en: Maybe it's time we both admit that we've outgrown each other.
translation.zh: 也许是时候承认我们俩渐行渐远已经不适合彼此了

translation.en: -[Cassie] Who's ready to go to Roddy's? -[friends cheering]
translation.zh: 有谁准备好要去罗迪家啦？

translation.en: [Cassie laughs] Let's do it. Sorry about that, guys.
translation.zh: 我们走吧 刚才的事很抱歉 各位

translation.en: Mona's missing her smile.
translation.zh: 蒙娜的微笑不见了

translation.en: Here's one.
translation.zh: 这儿有一块

translation.en: Put this here.
translation.zh: 放在这里

translation.en: That'll fix it.
translation.zh: 这样一来就好了

translation.en: Oh no.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: No, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 不要啊

translation.en: No. No, no, no.
translation.zh: 别这样

translation.en: So stupid.
translation.zh: 真蠢

translation.en: [sighs] So stupid.
translation.zh: 蠢死了

translation.en: Uh, hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: 打扰一下

translation.en: Did that go viral?
translation.zh: 在网上传开了？

translation.en: Oh, you're awake!
translation.zh: 你醒来啦？

translation.en: Welcome. Welcome.
translation.zh: 欢迎

translation.en: No, no, don't worry. No, it's research. It's not gone viral.
translation.zh: 不 别担心 我只是研究一下没有在网上传开

translation.en: I'm Val. I'll be your handler through this transition.
translation.zh: 我叫瓦尔我是你这个过渡期的负责人

translation.en: Well, it's nice to finally meet you, Miss Cassandra Adeline Garcia.
translation.zh: 很高兴能终于见到你本人卡珊德拉·阿德琳·加西亚小姐

translation.en: Now, according to my notes, you go by Cassie. You're 25--
translation.zh: 根据我这边的记录大家一般管你叫凯茜 -今年25岁…-还差个几天

translation.en: -In a few days. -Huh?
translation.zh: -今年25岁…-还差个几天

translation.en: Parents, Howie and Sofia, divorced.
translation.zh: 父母是霍伊和索菲娅 离异

translation.en: Born May 31st, died May 25th.
translation.zh: 生于5月31日 死于5月25日

translation.en: Died?
translation.zh: 死？

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Died May 26th.
translation.zh: 抱歉我说错了 是死于5月26日

translation.en: Who… who are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁啊？

translation.en: I'm Val. Otherwise known as your temporary guardian angel.
translation.zh: 我是瓦尔呀 也可以说 我是你的临时守护天使

translation.en: You don't look like a guardian angel. Shouldn't you have a halo?
translation.zh: 你看起来不像守护天使啊你不应该顶个光环吗？

translation.en: -Oh, special occasions only. -Okay, what about wings?
translation.zh: -光环是专为特殊场合准备的-那翅膀呢？

translation.en: Oh, no, we phased those out years ago.
translation.zh: 没有 那玩意老早就已经被淘汰掉了

translation.en: Okay. This… this can't really be happening.
translation.zh: 好吧 这不可能是真的

translation.en: I was… I was just with my friends.
translation.zh: 我刚才还跟我朋友们在一起呢

translation.en: Oh! I know! I… I had… I had champagne with gold flakes in it,
translation.zh: 我知道了！我喝了里面有金箔片的香槟

translation.en: and sometimes it makes you hallucinate. [laughs] I'm hallucinating.
translation.zh: 有时候那会让人产生幻觉我现在是产生幻觉了

translation.en: [laughs] No. This isn't a hallucination. Oh, this… this part's always hard.
translation.zh: 不 这不是幻觉这部分向来都这么艰难

translation.en: How can I put this?
translation.zh: 这话该怎么说呢？

translation.en: Yeah, um, you died.
translation.zh: 对 你死了

translation.en: -Stop saying that! -I mean, you saw it yourself, so--
translation.zh: -别再提这个字了！-你亲眼见到的 所以…

translation.en: -I died in the bathroom? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我死在了厕所里？-是啊

translation.en: Oh! Oh, this keeps getting worse!
translation.zh: 怎么越来越糟糕了！

translation.en: [splutters] Look, it's going to be okay.
translation.zh: 听我说 一切都会没事的

translation.en: And the good news is that the worst is over now that you're d--
translation.zh: 好消息是最坏的部分都已经过去了 你人死…

translation.en: No longer living.
translation.zh: …不活了以后

translation.en: You don't have to deal with all of those human annoyances,
translation.zh: 你就不用再对付那些做人时候的烦心事了

translation.en: you know, like heartbreak or PMS.
translation.zh: 你懂的 比如心碎啊 痛经啊什么的

translation.en: Just think of the afterlife as one long spa day.
translation.zh: 你就把身后的经历想成一个漫长的水疗日就对了

translation.en: And if you're one of the lucky ones, it could last for an eternity.
translation.zh: 而且如果你是幸运儿的话这天就会永远地持续下去

translation.en: So, I went up?
translation.zh: 就是说… 我上天了？

translation.en: -[inhales] Well-- -Is this down? I went down?
translation.zh: -这个嘛…-这里是下面？我下去了？

translation.en: You're in the middle. We call this the In-Between.
translation.zh: 你现在在中间 我们管这里叫中间界

translation.en: So like general admission?
translation.zh: 就好比是买了普通票？

translation.en: Sure. This is your personal waiting room. It's your safe space.
translation.zh: 可以吧 这里是你的私人等候室是你的安全区

translation.en: It's designed specifically to your taste
translation.zh: 这里是专门根据你个人品味来设计的

translation.en: to make your transition more… [inhales] …comfortable.
translation.zh: 为了让你的过渡来得更加舒适

translation.en: So everyone who dies is in the In-Between?
translation.zh: 就是说 每个人死后都会来中间界？

translation.en: Oh no. No, no, no. Maybe I should give you a pamphlet.
translation.zh: 噢 不 不是的 也许我应该给你本册子看看

translation.en: No, no! I don't need a pamphlet. Just tell me.
translation.zh: 不 我不要看什么册子你直接告诉我就行

translation.en: It can't be crazier than anything that's happening.
translation.zh: 因为没什么能比现在发生的这些更疯狂了

translation.en: Well, the In-Between is for those who have unfinished business back on Earth,
translation.zh: 是这样的 中间界是给那些在人间还有未尽之事的人准备的

translation.en: like yourself.
translation.zh: 比如你自己

translation.en: What unfinished business?
translation.zh: 什么未尽之事啊？

translation.en: Well, you get a second chance to make things right
translation.zh: 你将获得第二次机会能去找一张选定名单上的人

translation.en: with a select list of people,
translation.zh: 弥合彼此之间的关系

translation.en: you know, and if you succeed, you get sent to the Above.
translation.zh: 如果你成功了 你就会被送到上面去

translation.en: And if you don't, well, you know, it's…
translation.zh: 但如果没成功 你懂的 那就…

translation.en: it's just, it's… Yeah, it's, you know… [whistles]
translation.zh: 那就只能… 那个 你懂的…

translation.en: -It's… Yeah. -It…
translation.zh: -对-就…

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: But I thought it was for murderers and people who don't like Beyoncé.
translation.zh: 我还以为那是给杀人犯和不喜欢碧昂丝的人准备的

translation.en: -I'm a proud member of the Beyhive. -[chuckles] Yeah.
translation.zh: -我绝对是碧昂丝的忠实粉丝-是啊

translation.en: No, no, it's a tiered system. Yeah.
translation.zh: 不 这是一个分级的系统 嗯

translation.en: You want the Above. Trust me.
translation.zh: 最好还是去上面 相信我

translation.en: You ready to meet your list?
translation.zh: 准备好见你名单上的人了没？

translation.en: Now? No. I'm not ready! Oh!
translation.zh: 现在？不 我可没准备好！

translation.en: That was like riding a roller coaster backwards and blindfolded.
translation.zh: 这感觉就像是蒙着眼罩倒着坐过山车一样

translation.en: [chuckles] You get used to it.
translation.zh: 你会习惯的

translation.en: Wait, we're at my dad's house.
translation.zh: 等等 我们这是在我爸家

translation.en: Hey, Dad!
translation.zh: 嘿 爸！

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 喂

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 喂！

translation.en: [Cassie] Why isn't he responding?
translation.zh: 他怎么不回答我？

translation.en: He can't see or hear you.
translation.zh: 他看不见你 也听不见你

translation.en: No one can.
translation.zh: 没人可以

translation.en: What? No, that can't be right.
translation.zh: 什么？不是吧 不可能的

translation.en: Well, we can't risk scaring people on Earth.
translation.zh: 我们可不能冒这个险会吓到人间的人的

translation.en: They're so fragile.
translation.zh: 他们是如此脆弱

translation.en: [Cassie] Hello? Dad?
translation.zh: 喂？爸？

translation.en: It's me! It's Cassie, your favorite and only child.
translation.zh: 是我呀 凯茜你最爱的 也是唯一的孩子

translation.en: He never let me eat junk food.
translation.zh: 他从不让我吃垃圾食品的

translation.en: What is goin' on?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: And why is this house such a mess?
translation.zh: 还有为什么房子里这么乱？这…

translation.en: This… this is not like him.
translation.zh: 还有为什么房子里这么乱？这… 这一点也不像他啊

translation.en: He's Downward Dad. He's all about healthy living,
translation.zh: 他可是“下犬爹”啊健康生活对他来说就是一切

translation.en: and he even makes his own kombucha.
translation.zh: 他甚至还自己做红茶菌呢

translation.en: How long have I been gone?
translation.zh: 我走了有多久了？

translation.en: Val, how long?
translation.zh: 瓦尔 多久了？

translation.en: -A year. -A year?
translation.zh: -一年-一年？

translation.en: It feels like a day.
translation.zh: 感觉才过了一天

translation.en: Well, time works differently up there.
translation.zh: 在上面时间走得不一样快

translation.en: [sighs] Maybe I should've taken a pamphlet.
translation.zh: 也许我是应该拿本册子看的

translation.en: [Cassie] The last time he was like this was when my mom left.
translation.zh: 他上回这副模样还是我妈离开的时候

translation.en: After you passed,
translation.zh: 在你去世之后

translation.en: he gave up.
translation.zh: 他就自暴自弃了

translation.en: When was the last time you saw him?
translation.zh: 你最后一次见他是什么时候？

translation.en: I… I don't know. I…
translation.zh: 我也不知道 我…

translation.en: I kept meaning to visit, but there were all these events.
translation.zh: 我一直打算去看他但总有这样那样的活动要弄

translation.en: I liked one of his posts. Does that count?
translation.zh: 我赞过一个他发的东西 能算吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Is that why he's on my list?
translation.zh: 所以他才在我的名单上？

translation.en: He's in mourning.
translation.zh: 他在哀悼

translation.en: He needs a reason to feel hopeful again.
translation.zh: 他需要一个重获希望的理由

translation.en: Tell me what I should do.
translation.zh: 告诉我该怎么做

translation.en: You should see the rest of your list.
translation.zh: 你应该先去看看名单上的其他人

translation.en: Lisa? Really, Val? No. Pass. Hard pass.
translation.zh: 丽莎？真的 瓦尔？不行 不干 坚决不干

translation.en: There is no hard pass. There isn't even a regular pass.
translation.zh: 哪来什么“坚决不干”根本没有“不干”这回事

translation.en: What about if I kill it with my dad? Not kill kill. You know what I mean.
translation.zh: 要是我在我爸那边就能把这件事办成呢？

translation.en: Can we pretend Lisa isn't on the list?
translation.zh: 我们就假装丽莎不在名单上吧

translation.en: Why are you so afraid of seeing your best friend again?
translation.zh: 你为什么这么害怕再见到自己的好朋友？

translation.en: -My former BFF, and I'm not. -Mm.
translation.zh: 是我以前的好朋友 而且我不怕

translation.en: [Cassie] There's too much history between us.
translation.zh: 只是我俩之间的历史太复杂了

translation.en: Besides, I don't know if I want to. Some friendships just end, you know?
translation.zh: 而且 我还不知道我到底想不想 有些友谊就是戛然而止的

translation.en: Shouldn't I have a say in who's on my list?
translation.zh: 难道我没权决定名单上有谁吗？

translation.en: This is my afterlife we're talking about.
translation.zh: 这可是我自己的身后事

translation.en: [inhales sharply] She's been hiding in her work ever since you left.
translation.zh: 自从你离开后 她就一直躲在工作里

translation.en: Last one out. It's the same every day.
translation.zh: 最后一个下班 每天都是这样

translation.en: How about we skip Lisa and move to the next name?
translation.zh: 要不我们暂时跳过丽莎先去拜访下一个名字？

translation.en: -I'll take it. No complaints. Pinky swear. -No. I don't do that.
translation.zh: 让我一次 我就不抱怨了 拉钩钩 别 我可不做这种事

translation.en: But I will show you who's next on your list.
translation.zh: 但我可以让你看看你名单上下一个是谁

translation.en: Please be Koop. Please be Koop. Please be Koop.
translation.zh: 请一定要是库普

translation.en: How are you doing that?
translation.zh: 你到底是怎么做到的？

translation.en: Oh, you can do it too. It's all part of your basic angel package.
translation.zh: 你也可以啊这是基础天使套件中的一部分

translation.en: You just focus on where you want to go, give a little snap or a nod.
translation.zh: 只要专心想着你要去的地方 然后打个响指或者点个头

translation.en: One angel I know likes to wink.
translation.zh: 我认识一个天使喜欢眨眼

translation.en: Just make it your own. And then you're there.
translation.zh: 自己挑招牌动作 然后你就到了

translation.en: So, I can go anywhere?
translation.zh: 那我想去哪里都可以？

translation.en: Oh, no, not anywhere.
translation.zh: 不 不是哪里都可以

translation.en: Your teleporting is limited to places that you're needed only.
translation.zh: 你的传送能力只能用在有人需要你的地方

translation.en: No detours.
translation.zh: 不能顺道绕

translation.en: -Got it. -Right. Now, back to the list.
translation.zh: -明白了-嗯 好嘞 继续我们的名单

translation.en: -Ugh. I don't know if I'm ready for more. -[woman] Morgan, slow down!
translation.zh: 我不知道我有没有准备好继续啊 摩根 慢一点！

translation.en: -Wait for Mommy! -[Morgan giggles]
translation.zh: 等等妈妈！

translation.en: [in English] Hi, you're so fast. [kisses] Oh.
translation.zh: 嗨 你真是太快了

translation.en: -That's-- -[Val] Your mother.
translation.zh: -那是…-你的母亲

translation.en: I haven't called her that since the day she moved out.
translation.zh: 自她从家里搬出去后我就再也没这么叫过她

translation.en: -She's Sofia to me. -[Sofia speaks indistinctly]
translation.zh: 对我而言 她是索菲娅

translation.en: [Cassie] Is that my half sister?
translation.zh: 那是我同母异父的妹妹吗？

translation.en: I've never met her.
translation.zh: 我还从没见过她呢

translation.en: So, you do have some unfinished business, then.
translation.zh: 看来你还真有不少未尽之事 对吧

translation.en: Can we go now, please?
translation.zh: 我们能走了吗？拜托了

translation.en: [scoffs] It's only three names.
translation.zh: 只有三个人而已

translation.en: Not easy ones.
translation.zh: 个个都不容易

translation.en: [tuts] Oh, you can do this, Cassie.
translation.zh: 你能行的 凯茜 我相信你

translation.en: -I believe in you. -That makes one of us.
translation.zh: 你能行的 凯茜 我相信你 也就只有你信了

translation.en: You have the five Earth days leading up to your birthday to complete this list.
translation.zh: 你将有五天人间的时间赶在你生日前完成这个名单

translation.en: Wait, five days?
translation.zh: 等等 五天？

translation.en: Sure. Why not? Hey, you know what? Why don't we make it two days?
translation.zh: 好呀 干嘛不呢？ 你猜怎么着？不如就给我两天吧

translation.en: Or better yet, we can just cram it all into one!
translation.zh: 要不干脆挤进一天好了！

translation.en: Well, just think of it as Cassie-palooza, the afterlife edition.
translation.zh: 你就把这当作是凯茜狂欢周 身后版

translation.en: It's… it's like Cassie…
translation.zh: 这就像是凯茜…

translation.en: No. No, you're right. Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯 你说得对 是不好

translation.en: Okay, right.
translation.zh: 好吧 那么

translation.en: Right, so a name will disappear
translation.zh: 是这样的 每当你了结一件未尽之事

translation.en: each time it's deemed that you have closure.
translation.zh: 对应的名字就会消失掉

translation.en: How am I supposed to do this if I can't communicate?
translation.zh: 可我要怎么了结啊？我连交流都没办法

translation.en: Well, you'll find a way.
translation.zh: 你会找到办法的

translation.en: Can I text? Tweet? TikTok?
translation.zh: 我能发信息吗？发推特？发抖音？

translation.en: No, no, and definitely negatory.
translation.zh: 否、不行、门都没有

translation.en: Do I at least get cool superpowers, like mind control or something?
translation.zh: 至少能给我些很酷的超能力吧？比如精神控制什么的？

translation.en: It's guardian-angel level only.
translation.zh: 你只有守护天使级别的能力

translation.en: This is about you learning to really connect with the people closest to you.
translation.zh: 这就是为了让你学会如何真正地与跟你最亲近的人交流

translation.en: Yeah, and what if I can't?
translation.zh: 那如果我学不会呢？

translation.en: Well, I'll be here if you need me.
translation.zh: 你有需要的话 随时找我啊

translation.en: Except between noon and 4:00. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 好吧 除了正午到四点钟之外

translation.en: [chuckling] I'm kidding. It's a joke.
translation.zh: 我开玩笑呢 逗你玩的

translation.en: Look, I'm always going to be here for you.
translation.zh: 听着 我会一直在你身边帮你

translation.en: Now, is there anything else before go time?
translation.zh: 在正式开始前还有什么别的问题吗？

translation.en: Well,
translation.zh: 这个嘛

translation.en: actually, I, um…
translation.zh: 其实我…

translation.en: I was wondering--
translation.zh: 我一直想知道…

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. I know what you're thinking.
translation.zh: 嗯 我知道你在想什么

translation.en: And, uh, yes,
translation.zh: 答案是 可以

translation.en: you do get a wardrobe change.
translation.zh: 你可以换衣服

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. You just close your eyes and envision what you want to wear.
translation.zh: 你只需要闭上双眼想象自己想要穿成的样子就行

translation.en: But just so you know, you only get one wardrobe change a day,
translation.zh: 但有一点要说清楚你每天只能换一套衣服

translation.en: so make it count.
translation.zh: 所以你要好好把握

translation.en: -It's so sparkly. -[rock music fades]
translation.zh: 真闪呐

translation.en: I think this might be my favorite part about being here.
translation.zh: 我想这可能是我来这里后最喜欢的一点了

translation.en: I guess it really is time.
translation.zh: 看来真是时候了

translation.en: Somebody call Marie Kondo because joy is not sparking here.
translation.zh: 谁赶紧给近藤麻理惠打个电话 因为这里根本没有能让人怦然心动的东西

translation.en: Lisa first.
translation.zh: 第一个就是丽莎

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 棒极了

translation.en: Guess I'm ripping the Band-Aid off.
translation.zh: 看来我要揭旧伤疤了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: What would Val do?
translation.zh: 瓦尔是怎么弄的？

translation.en: -I did it. -[whimsical music playing]
translation.zh: 我成功了

translation.en: What the gamer geek?
translation.zh: 什么鬼高玩啊？

translation.en: Who are you, and what did you do to my room?
translation.zh: 你谁啊？你在我房间里做什么？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Oh, the cute neighbor still lives here. Are you two in love yet?
translation.zh: 这个帅邻居还住在这里啊 你俩已经坠入爱河了吗？

translation.en: -Hey, you. -Hey. Morning.
translation.zh: -你好呀-早上好

translation.en: -Are you just getting home now? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你现在才回家啊？-是啊

translation.en: I'm, uh, in the process of scoring this game
translation.zh: 我正在给一款游戏作曲

translation.en: about, uh, post-apocalyptic, motorcycle-riding zombie Vikings.
translation.zh: 讲的是世界末日后一帮骑摩托车的维京人僵尸的

translation.en: It sounds lame now I'm saying it out loud, but it's pretty dope
translation.zh: 我这么说出来 听着好像挺挫的 但实际上还是蛮牛的

translation.en: if post-apocalyptic, motorcycle-riding zombie Vikings are your thing.
translation.zh: 前提是你喜欢世界末日后骑摩托车的维京人僵尸

translation.en: You're heading to work early. Oh, no watch.
translation.zh: 你这么早就去上班啊 没手表

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I, um…
translation.zh: 是啊 我…

translation.en: I like getting to work before everybody else, you know? The calm is… is, um--
translation.zh: 我喜欢赶在其他人之前到那份平静很…

translation.en: Calming.
translation.zh: 令人平静

translation.en: -Exactly. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -正是-嗯

translation.en: -You get it. -Yeah, I do.
translation.zh: -你懂-嗯 我懂

translation.en: -[Max chuckles] -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是啊-是啊

translation.en: Cool, well, hopefully one day, when our schedules can align,
translation.zh: 好的 希望哪天我俩的时间能对上

translation.en: um, we can properly hang out? Me and you?
translation.zh: 可以正经地一起出去玩？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -好啊-好吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, okay. Okay. Yes, yes. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -嗯 好的 可以-嗯

translation.en: -Yeah, I would… I would like that. -Brilliant.
translation.zh: -嗯 我很乐意-太棒了

translation.en: -Okay, well, um, I'm gonna go. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -嗯 那么 我得走了-嗯

translation.en: -Cool. Well, have a good day. -Thank you. You too.
translation.zh: -祝你今天愉快-谢谢 也祝你愉快

translation.en: -Good seeing you. Bye. -Bye.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你 再见-再见

translation.en: It's been a year, and you still haven't gone out with him?
translation.zh: 都已经过去了整整一年你还没跟他出去约会过？

translation.en: It is a good thing I'm back.
translation.zh: 还好我回来了

translation.en: So the way we ended things… Talk about bad timing!
translation.zh: 我们绝交的那件事 时间还真是凑得不巧呐

translation.en: Are you still mad at me?
translation.zh: 你还在生我气吗？

translation.en: I know I should still be mad at you, but it doesn't feel right anymore.
translation.zh: 我知道我应该还在生你的气 但事到如今还这样就不太好了

translation.en: -When did this place open? -[Lisa laughs]
translation.zh: 这家店什么时候开的啊？

translation.en: Ugh! I hate being so out of touch!
translation.zh: 我最讨厌跟不上趟了！

translation.en: Morning, Emme. How are you?
translation.zh: 早上好 艾米 你好吗？

translation.en: Hi. I've got your order waiting.
translation.zh: 嗨 我已经把你的单准备好了

translation.en: Oh my-- Emme, you spoil me.
translation.zh: 我的天 艾米 你要把我宠坏了

translation.en: Who is Emme? I know all your friends, and I don't know her.
translation.zh: 这个艾米是谁啊？ 你的朋友我都认识 从没听过她

translation.en: -[Lisa] Okay. -Ta-da!
translation.zh: -好嘞-嗒哒！

translation.en: Oh. Ooh. What is that smell?
translation.zh: 这什么香味？

translation.en: I'm working on a new brownie recipe. They're just out of the oven. Wanna try?
translation.zh: 我正在研究一个新的布朗尼配方 刚刚新鲜出炉 想试试吗？

translation.en: I will always be your guinea pig.
translation.zh: 我愿意做你一辈子的小白鼠

translation.en: So, um, how has everything been? Are you feeling a little bit more settled?
translation.zh: 那么 最近怎么样啊？有没有感觉稍微适应一些？

translation.en: [Emme] Things are good.
translation.zh: 还不错吧

translation.en: Haven't seen much of the town yet. I should probably get out more.
translation.zh: 还没怎么在城里逛过呢我应该多出去玩玩

translation.en: Baked goods aren't the best conversationalists.
translation.zh: 烘焙食品并不是一个有趣的话题

translation.en: Well, neither are bones.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 骨头也不是

translation.en: I am thinking of throwing a one-year anniversary party for the shop.
translation.zh: 我在考虑要不要给我们店办一场周年庆派对

translation.en: That would be so cool.
translation.zh: 那太好了

translation.en: Careful. It's hot.
translation.zh: 小心 很烫的

translation.en: -Oh! -[Lisa] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I miss brownies. Why couldn't I have had death by chocolate?
translation.zh: 我好怀念布朗尼啊 为什么我就不能被巧克力噎死呢？

translation.en: Wow. Wow. I mean, this is… this is incredible.
translation.zh: 哇 这真是太好吃了

translation.en: Oh, it's made with love. And agave.
translation.zh: 我在里面加了爱 还有龙舌兰糖浆

translation.en: I need to go to work, but thank you. I'll see you later, okay?
translation.zh: 我得去上班了 谢谢你 我们回头见

translation.en: -Ciao for now. -Bye!
translation.zh: -先再见咯-再会！

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再会

translation.en: So, how's your list coming along?
translation.zh: 你的名单怎么样了？

translation.en: The quiet type, huh?
translation.zh: 不爱说话的类型 嗯？

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: this is your life now.
translation.zh: 这就是你现在的生活啦

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -You beat me to work. Again. -[gasps, exhales]
translation.zh: 你又赶在我前面到岗了

translation.en: Oh, jumpy.
translation.zh: 一惊一乍的

translation.en: Are you on something?
translation.zh: 你是嗑了什么药吗？

translation.en: Next time, bring enough for the whole class! [laughs]
translation.zh: 下回多带点 要够全班分享的！

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -What do you want, Raj? -[Raj] Did you hear?
translation.zh: -你想干嘛 拉杰？-你听说了吗？

translation.en: Uh, hear what?
translation.zh: 听说什么？

translation.en: Dr. Redding's leading a dig at Hell's Creek this summer,
translation.zh: 雷丁博士今年夏天要在地狱溪组织一场挖掘

translation.en: and she's looking for a junior field researcher to join.
translation.zh: 她正在找一个初级实地研究员加入她的团队

translation.en: Wait, Dr. Marion Redding? Are you messing with me?
translation.zh: 等等 玛丽恩·雷丁博士？你是逗我玩吗？

translation.en: Not only that, the GOAT herself is coming into the office
translation.zh: 不仅如此 她本尊会亲自出马 到我们办公室来进行面试

translation.en: to hold interviews. I'm about to go sign up over at the…
translation.zh: 到我们办公室来进行面试 我正要去报名呢 报名表就在…

translation.en: break room.
translation.zh: 休息室里

translation.en: [Cassie] A sign-up sheet.
translation.zh: 报名表

translation.en: How retro. But I dig it.
translation.zh: 真够复古的 但我喜欢

translation.en: What are you waiting for? Just write your name.
translation.zh: 你还在等什么呐？把你名字写上啊

translation.en: L-I--
translation.zh: 丽…

translation.en: -[Raj] Pretty competitive, huh? -[groans]
translation.zh: 竞争挺激烈的 对吧？

translation.en: And she's only picking one person.
translation.zh: 而且她就只挑一个人

translation.en: I think we all know who that'll be.
translation.zh: 我想我们都知道那个人会是谁

translation.en: R-A-J. B-R-I-T-T-O.
translation.zh: 拉杰·布里托

translation.en: [winces] Only four spots left.
translation.zh: 只剩四个空位了

translation.en: Don't listen. He's trying to psych you out in the lamest way possible.
translation.zh: 别听他的 他只是想唬住你 而且还是这种最最挫的方式

translation.en: I'm gonna sign up later.
translation.zh: 我还是晚一点再报名

translation.en: I have a lot of work to do, so I can't really think about this kind of thing right now.
translation.zh: 我还有很多事要做所以我现在没时间想这件事

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 可以呀

translation.en: You're giving up?
translation.zh: 你这就放弃了？

translation.en: In the bag, Britto.
translation.zh: 胜券在握了 布里托

translation.en: What's so important?
translation.zh: 什么事这么重要啊？

translation.en: I left a farmer in his barn-themed waiting room for you. Are you okay?
translation.zh: 我把一个农民撂在了他谷仓主题的等候室里 先跑来找你了 你没事吧？

translation.en: It… it's Lisa. She's so stubborn.
translation.zh: 是丽莎 她真是太顽固了

translation.en: You know, I don't think this is gonna work.
translation.zh: 我觉得这样下去不行

translation.en: She doesn't seem to miss me. There's no trace of me anywhere.
translation.zh: 她好像一点也不想我哪里都没有我的痕迹

translation.en: Oh, and get this. I've been replaced by this roommate who is full-on dark web.
translation.zh: 哦 对了 我已经被一个整天泡在暗网上的室友取代了

translation.en: -Why aren't you saying anything? -You're saying enough for the both of us.
translation.zh: 你怎么一句话也不说？ 你已经把我们俩的话都说了

translation.en: Look, I know going back is hard,
translation.zh: 听我说 我明白回去是很艰难的

translation.en: but you aren't forgotten.
translation.zh: 但你并没有被遗忘

translation.en: Oh, I don't know about that.
translation.zh: 我看可不是这样

translation.en: Well, maybe if we cut out all the "I"s and "me"s and look harder,
translation.zh: 或许当我们把这些话里的“我”都去掉 更仔细地寻找一番

translation.en: you'll find that she actually does need you.
translation.zh: 你就会发觉 她其实是很需要你的

translation.en: Why are you sleeping?
translation.zh: 你怎么在睡觉啊？

translation.en: There is a whole world out there, and you are missing it.
translation.zh: 外头这么精彩的世界 全被你错过了

translation.en: Lisa. Lisa, wake up.
translation.zh: 丽莎 醒醒

translation.en: I need to talk to you.
translation.zh: 我得跟你谈谈

translation.en: Lisa, wake up!
translation.zh: 丽莎 快醒醒！

translation.en: Wake up! Wake up! Wake up!
translation.zh: 醒醒！

translation.en: Wake up! Wake up!
translation.zh: 醒醒啊！

translation.en: Come on, Val. This isn't fair.
translation.zh: 拜托 瓦尔 这不公平

translation.en: How am I supposed to do this if my best friend can't see or hear me?
translation.zh: 要是我的好朋友看不见也听不见我 我要怎么才能了结啊？

translation.en: I need a little help here, please!
translation.zh: 我需要一点帮助 求你了！

translation.en: [Lisa] Piper, turn down your game.
translation.zh: 派珀 把游戏开轻点

translation.en: Trying to sleep.
translation.zh: 我要睡觉呢

translation.en: -Why won't you let me sleep? -[humming continues]
translation.zh: 你干嘛不让人睡觉啊？

translation.en: -What's happening? -[splutters] I don't know.
translation.zh: -怎么回事啊？-我也不知道

translation.en: Oh, but it worked!
translation.zh: 但我成功了！

translation.en: You can't be… you can't be here. No.
translation.zh: 你不可能在这里的 不

translation.en: Oh, you can see me?
translation.zh: 你能看到我？

translation.en: This is a dream. Maybe a nightmare. Work… work… work has been stressful.
translation.zh: 这是一场梦 也许是做噩梦了最近工作压力大

translation.en: You can hear me too?
translation.zh: 你还能听见我说话？

translation.en: [gasps] This isn't supposed to be happening.
translation.zh: 不应该这样的呀

translation.en: This is awesome, and crazy, but mostly awesome.
translation.zh: 真是棒极了 也很疯狂但最主要是棒极了

translation.en: You aren't here. Nope. You died.
translation.zh: 你没在这里 不 你已经死了

translation.en: Yeah, that sucked.
translation.zh: 是啊 死可真不好玩

translation.en: I don't believe in whatever you are.
translation.zh: 无论你是什么鬼东西 我都不信

translation.en: I'm nothing scary! I'm like a junior guardian angel.
translation.zh: 我不是可怕的东西 我是个初级守护天使好吧 还不是正式的

translation.en: Well, not officially. I don't know if that's a thing,
translation.zh: 我是个初级守护天使好吧 还不是正式的 虽然我不知道有没有这回事但我是这么定位的

translation.en: but that's how I make sense of it. Titles aren't important right now.
translation.zh: 虽然我不知道有没有这回事但我是这么定位的 总之头衔不是现在的重点

translation.en: I'll be back.
translation.zh: 我会回来的

translation.en: Not… not in an ominous way! In a good way.
translation.zh: 不是阴魂不散的那种！是很好的那种

translation.en: It's really nice to be able to talk to you again.
translation.zh: 能再跟你说上话真是太好了

translation.en: [whispering] Please be gone. Please be…
translation.zh: 快退散 快退…

translation.en: Sorry for interrupting, but you'll never believe what happened. Lisa--
translation.zh: 很抱歉打扰你 但你绝对不会相信刚才发生了什么 丽莎…

translation.en: Can see and hear you. Yep. Yep. Everyone knows. You're trending.
translation.zh: 能看见和听见你 对大家都知道了 你上了热门榜

translation.en: I've heard rumors of this, but I've never experienced it.
translation.zh: 我听说过这方面的传言但从来没有体验过

translation.en: Making contact used to be fairly common,
translation.zh: 与活人接触在以前是挺常见的

translation.en: but now, with all the distractions, it's practically non-existent.
translation.zh: 可如今 有这么多分散注意力的东西 基本上已经见不着了

translation.en: Well, it happened.
translation.zh: 反正是发生了

translation.en: You never forget the first time your friend looks at you in sheer terror.
translation.zh: 你永远也忘不了第一次见到你的朋友极度恐惧地看着你的样子

translation.en: Everyone's staring at me like I'm a unicorn.
translation.zh: 所有人都在盯着我好像我是独角兽似的

translation.en: This is the Angels' Den. It's the central command of the In-Between.
translation.zh: 这里是天使之巢是中间界的中央指挥部

translation.en: Unicorns are in a different area.
translation.zh: 独角兽在另一个区域

translation.en: A book? Really?
translation.zh: 书？真的假的？

translation.en: Yes. Don't you just love books?
translation.zh: 是啊 难道你不爱书吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好嘞

translation.en: Mm. Here.
translation.zh: （你能看到我 怎么办？） 这里

translation.en: Yep, yep, yep. There we are.
translation.zh: 对 找到了

translation.en: Okay. It's quite rare.
translation.zh: 好嘞 这情况很少见

translation.en: "Said In-Betweener can only affect the physical world
translation.zh: “只有在能被对方看见时 该中间界者才能影响实体世界”

translation.en: once visible to subject."
translation.zh: 该中间界者才能影响实体世界”

translation.en: "It mainly happens in cases
translation.zh: “通常发生这种情况

translation.en: where the people involved were extraordinarily connected."
translation.zh: 说明当事人之间的关系非常紧密”

translation.en: "Some call it soul mates or kindred spirits."
translation.zh: “有人称之为灵魂伴侣或是志趣相投”

translation.en: So,
translation.zh: 所以说

translation.en: it might be a fluke in the system,
translation.zh: 要么是系统里出现了问题

translation.en: or it's just you and Lisa.
translation.zh: 要么就只有你和丽莎

translation.en: -We should test it. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我们应该测试一下-好啊

translation.en: Go on, then. Start talking to someone. Let's see what happens.
translation.zh: -去吧 找个人说话 看看会怎么样-好的

translation.en: Okay. Hey! What's up?
translation.zh: 喂！你好吗？

translation.en: Go on.
translation.zh: 继续啊

translation.en: Hey, guys. How's it goin'?
translation.zh: 哎 你们好

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Hey, ladies! Ooh! I like your shoes. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 两位女士！我好喜欢你们的鞋子

translation.en: -[women speaking indistinctly] -No? Nothing?
translation.zh: 嗯？什么反应都没有？

translation.en: Okay. No one's responding.
translation.zh: 好吧 没人回答

translation.en: I'm usually the center of the party, not on the sidelines. This feels odd.
translation.zh: 我通常都是派对的中心不是在场边作陪衬 这感觉可真奇怪

translation.en: You seem strangely cheerful for someone trying to solve a fluke in the system.
translation.zh: 作为一个想办法解决系统问题的人 你看上去怎么好像还挺愉快的啊

translation.en: There's just so much energy.
translation.zh: 这里真是充满了活力

translation.en: Isn't it beautiful?
translation.zh: 难道不美吗？

translation.en: You know the saying "angel on your shoulder"?
translation.zh: 你知道“肩膀上的天使”这个说法吧？

translation.en: That's who I want to be.
translation.zh: 我想做的就是这个

translation.en: A guardian angel who's there through all of these stages of life.
translation.zh: 一个在人生中每个阶段都帮助人的守护天使

translation.en: Not just at the end.
translation.zh: 不只有在结束时

translation.en: So why don't you? It's not my decision to make.
translation.zh: -那你为什么不去做呢？-这个决定不由我

translation.en: Is this dog barking at me?
translation.zh: 这只狗是在冲着我叫吗？

translation.en: [Val] Oh, he can see you!
translation.zh: 他能看见你！

translation.en: Yeah. Animals are more open to the spiritual world. Some kids are too.
translation.zh: 动物对灵魂世界的感知更强有些孩子也是

translation.en: No, poppet, we're working. Go back to your owner.
translation.zh: 别这样 亲爱的 我们在工作呢回到你主人那儿去

translation.en: [Val] Go on.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: So we can talk to animals?
translation.zh: 就是说我们能跟动物说话？

translation.en: Not we. I can. Yeah, it's above your power grade.
translation.zh: 不是我们 是我能不好意思 这在你的能力之上

translation.en: -Oh. -Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Right, so nothing from strangers.
translation.zh: 好了 就是说陌生人没回应

translation.en: -Nope. -That's good, actually. Less cleanup.
translation.zh: 其实这样最好 修复更简单

translation.en: We should try someone close to you.
translation.zh: 我们应该找个与你亲密的人试试

translation.en: Not much to report since I talked to you last.
translation.zh: 自从上次找你聊完之后没什么大变化好说的

translation.en: Is he trying to talk to me?
translation.zh: 他是要跟我说话吗？

translation.en: I stopped seeing that woman I told you about, Maria.
translation.zh: 我已经不再见那个女的了 上次跟你提过的玛利亚

translation.en: She's nice. I'm just not ready yet.
translation.zh: 她人很好 只是我还没准备好

translation.en: He's been doing this since you left. Brings him comfort.
translation.zh: 自从你离开后 他就一直这样 能给他带来一些慰藉

translation.en: This whole room does.
translation.zh: 这整个房间都能

translation.en: The yoga studio's doing fine.
translation.zh: 瑜伽工作室最近也不错

translation.en: I'm still more focused on running it than teaching.
translation.zh: 我依旧把精力放在管理上 多过教学

translation.en: There's been requests for me to teach my sunrise class again. I probably should.
translation.zh: 有不少人要求我重新教日出课我可能应该教吧

translation.en: I just feel so guilty going on like normal when you can't.
translation.zh: 我感到很内疚 我能继续过正常的生活 而你却不能

translation.en: I miss you, kiddo.
translation.zh: 我好想你 孩子

translation.en: All I ever wanted was to protect you, and I couldn't even do that.
translation.zh: 我只是想是保护你而已可我连这也没做到

translation.en: Oh, Dad, but you did.
translation.zh: 可是 爸 你保护了

translation.en: Remember that song I used to sing to you when you were little?
translation.zh: 记得小时候我唱给你的那首歌吗？

translation.en: I don't remember.
translation.zh: 我不记得了

translation.en: Try. Maybe I will.
translation.zh: 试试 也许我能记起来

translation.en: That was a long time ago.
translation.zh: 那是好久以前了

translation.en: I'm sorry for not visiting much.
translation.zh: 对不起 我没怎么来看你

translation.en: For making fun of your Downward Dad posts.
translation.zh: 还嘲笑你发的“下犬爹”

translation.en: I'm gonna let you know I'm okay.
translation.zh: 我要让你知道我没事

translation.en: Somehow.
translation.zh: 得想个办法

translation.en: We can try your mum.
translation.zh: 我们可以试试你妈

translation.en: I'm not ready for her yet.
translation.zh: 我还没准备好见她

translation.en: I'm going back to Lisa. I wanna fix this.
translation.zh: 我要回去找丽莎 我想把这事解决了

translation.en: It'll be day two, so make it count.
translation.zh: 那要第二天了 所以你要好好把握

translation.en: [whispering] I'm clearly just having a stroke.
translation.zh: 很显然我是中风了

translation.en: Wait, Lisa, wait!
translation.zh: 等等 丽莎 等一下！

translation.en: -You felt that too? -[whispering] This isn't happening.
translation.zh: -你还能感觉到？-这不是真的

translation.en: Let me explain, okay? Or at least try.
translation.zh: 听我解释 好吗？至少让我试试

translation.en: Uh, there's this list. And for me to get to the big party in the sky--
translation.zh: 这里有张名单为了能让我有资格去天上的大派对…

translation.en: [whispering] Go away.
translation.zh: 走开

translation.en: A door? Really?
translation.zh: 靠门？真的？

translation.en: [loudly] Oh, come on!
translation.zh: 拜托！

translation.en: Let's analyze some fossils. Whoo!
translation.zh: 我们开始分析化石吧！

translation.en: I'm not gonna hurt you. I just wanna talk.
translation.zh: 我不会伤害你的 我只是想谈谈

translation.en: Okay. If you don't wanna talk right now, then we don't have to. Fine.
translation.zh: 如果你现在不想谈的话我也不会逼你 没事 但在我们谈之前我是哪儿也不会去的

translation.en: But I'm not going anywhere until we do.
translation.zh: 没事 但在我们谈之前我是哪儿也不会去的

translation.en: [Lisa] No, no. I'm just working too hard.
translation.zh: 不 我只是工作太累了

translation.en: Because I'm working hard, it could cause the visions.
translation.zh: 因为工作得太累 才造成幻视的

translation.en: Okay. I'm sick! So sick. I'm sick.
translation.zh: 好吗？我生病了！病得不轻 我病了

translation.en: -Otherwise, it doesn't make sense. -Maybe not, but it's happening.
translation.zh: 不然这就根本讲不通了 也许是讲不通 但事情就是这样了

translation.en: Don't be shy. Come and try.
translation.zh: 别害羞 来嗅嗅

translation.en: Why wait till it's too late?
translation.zh: 机不可失 失不再来

translation.en: Uh-oh. You look like you could do with a caramel mocha pretzel bite.
translation.zh: 你看起来正需要来一块焦糖摩卡咸脆饼

translation.en: [sighs] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Or two.
translation.zh: 或是两块

translation.en: Let's get you inside.
translation.zh: 我们到里面去吧

translation.en: This place has so much potential, but what is with all the doilies?
translation.zh: 这地方潜力无限大可为什么要搞这么多小桌布啊？

translation.en: Would you like a calming tea or…
translation.zh: 来一杯茶定定惊还是…

translation.en: [whispering] No. I… I don't need calming.
translation.zh: 不 我不需要定惊

translation.en: I need an exorcist.
translation.zh: 我需要找个驱魔师

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, I can't help you with that.
translation.zh: 这我可帮不了你

translation.en: [Lisa] Okay. So, um,
translation.zh: 是这样的

translation.en: this is the one-year anniversary of my best friend's death.
translation.zh: 今天是我好朋友死亡一周年的纪念日

translation.en: -I think it's making me a little crazy. -Your flatmate, the one you told me about?
translation.zh: 我想我要因为这个发疯了 就是你跟我说过的那个室友？

translation.en: -You told her about me? -Yeah, Cassie.
translation.zh: -你把我的事告诉她了？-对 凯茜

translation.en: This is gonna sound really weird, but, um,
translation.zh: 接下来这番话听起来会很奇怪 但…

translation.en: she talks to me, and… [breathes heavily]
translation.zh: 她会跟我说话 而且

translation.en: …I can see her.
translation.zh: 我能看到她

translation.en: That doesn't sound weird at all. She was your best mate. She's part of you.
translation.zh: 这听起来一点也不奇怪 她曾是你最要好的伙伴她是你的一部分

translation.en: -Thank you for letting me lay this on you. -[Emme laughs]
translation.zh: 谢谢你听我说这些

translation.en: I just… I really, really needed to talk to someone.
translation.zh: 我真的很需要找人谈谈

translation.en: Is she here now?
translation.zh: 她现在在这儿吗？

translation.en: -Boo! -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: -吓你！-嗯

translation.en: -Yeah. Yeah. She, uh… -[Emme] Oh. …she thinks your store needs a makeover.
translation.zh: 是的 她认为你的店需要装修一下

translation.en: Oh! Well, I'm open to anything that will encourage people to hang out.
translation.zh: 只要能吸引顾客进来我什么建议都愿意听

translation.en: See? She agrees with me. I'm starting to like this Emme.
translation.zh: 看到没？她同意我的看法我开始喜欢这个艾米了

translation.en: [Emme] Look, everyone deals with grief in their own way.
translation.zh: 每个人都有自己面对悲痛的方法

translation.en: -It's a compliment when they come back. -This doesn't feel like a compliment.
translation.zh: 他们回来 说明你好啊 这感觉可并不好啊

translation.en: -Would your friend like an eclair? -Don't… don't encourage her, please.
translation.zh: -你的朋友要不要来个奶油卷？-别鼓励她 拜托

translation.en: Thank you for understanding, Emme. Thank you. I just…
translation.zh: 谢谢你的理解 艾米 我只是…

translation.en: I think that I need to go and be by myself for a while. I'm just gonna do that.
translation.zh: 我觉得我需要一个人静一静 我这就去

translation.en: Who turns down a free eclair? I can't eat, and I'd still take it.
translation.zh: 谁会拒绝免费的奶油卷啊？ 我就算吃不下也会拿走

translation.en: [whispering] Could you please just give me a little bit of space?
translation.zh: 能请你给我一点空间吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Okay, that's it. I'm Googling therapists.
translation.zh: -你散步散得如何呀？-好吧 够了 我要去谷歌心理治疗师

translation.en: I didn't mean to scare you. Okay?
translation.zh: 我不是故意来吓你 好吗？

translation.en: [splutters] I am also trying to make sense of everything.
translation.zh: 我也在想办法搞清楚这些事

translation.en: Look, is this happening because of that fight we had?
translation.zh: 这一切都是因为我们那次吵架吗？

translation.en: If I had known that was the last time we would see each other, I--
translation.zh: 因为要是我知道那会是我们俩最后一次见面的话 我…

translation.en: I would have done things differently too.
translation.zh: 我也会换个方式的

translation.en: Is that why you're here? Be… because of what I said?
translation.zh: 所以你才来这里吗？因为我说的话吗？

translation.en: According to…
translation.zh: 是的 根据…

translation.en: -Do you mean God? -Val.
translation.zh: -你是说神？-瓦尔

translation.en: A woman? I knew it.
translation.zh: 是女的？我就知道

translation.en: Val's my handler. She's like my temp guardian angel.
translation.zh: 瓦尔是我的负责人可以说她是我的临时守护天使

translation.en: In order for me to move up, fingers crossed,
translation.zh: 为了让我能到上面去 愿神保佑

translation.en: I'm supposed to help you, my dad, and my mom for some reason.
translation.zh: 我必须要来帮助你和我爸不知为什么还有我妈

translation.en: Well, I don't need help.
translation.zh: 可我不需要帮助

translation.en: Look, I didn't make the list.
translation.zh: 名单不是我列的

translation.en: I wanna show you something.
translation.zh: 我想给你看样东西

translation.en: I found it under your bed.
translation.zh: 在你床底下找到的

translation.en: Your dad took the rest of your stuff.
translation.zh: 你爸拿走了你其他的东西

translation.en: Um… [smacks lips] You wouldn't recognize your room. -Oh, I saw. -Huh.
translation.zh: -你保证会认不出自己房间的-我看到过了

translation.en: Something told me I should keep it.
translation.zh: 某种感觉告诉我 我应该把它留下来

translation.en: -I thought you'd forgotten about me. -What?
translation.zh: -我还以为你把我忘了呢-什么？

translation.en: We've been in each other's lives for as long as I can remember.
translation.zh: 自打我有记忆起我们俩就一直在对方的生命中

translation.en: How… how could you think that?
translation.zh: 你怎么会这么想？

translation.en: Being dead brings up a lot of insecurities.
translation.zh: 死了以后 人会多好多不安全感

translation.en: [Lisa] Are those from your mom?
translation.zh: 这些是你妈发来的？

translation.en: [Cassie] Yep.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Postcards from all the amazing places she visited after she left us.
translation.zh: 来自她离开我们后去过的各种好地方的明信片

translation.en: Hey, uh,
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: would you… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你要不要…

translation.en: …maybe wanna puzzle?
translation.zh: 想不想玩拼图？

translation.en: You still have it.
translation.zh: 你还留着

translation.en: [Lisa] Some of the pieces might be missing.
translation.zh: 有几片可能不见了

translation.en: I found it on the floor that morning.
translation.zh: 那天早上我在地板上找到的

translation.en: Can't leave Mona without her smile this time.
translation.zh: 这回可不能让蒙娜少了微笑

translation.en: Look, I don't know what's happening, and I probably need to schedule an MRI,
translation.zh: 我不知道这是怎么回事 我可能需要去做个核磁共振

translation.en: but it is really, really nice to have you back.
translation.zh: 但你能回来 我真的很高兴

translation.en: It's really nice to be back.
translation.zh: 我也很高兴能回来

translation.en: Hi, Piper.
translation.zh: 嗨 派珀

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吧？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不好

translation.en: -What do you think she does in there? -Money laundering, hacking.
translation.zh: 你说她在里面都做什么啊？ 洗钱、做黑客

translation.en: Basic roommate stuff.
translation.zh: 普通室友会做的事

translation.en: -This almost feels like old times. -Almost.
translation.zh: -这感觉几乎就像是以前一样-是啊

translation.en: -You know what'd make it better? -Your boyfriend Koop's music?
translation.zh: -知道加什么会更棒吗？-你男朋友库普的音乐？

translation.en: I can't help who I love!
translation.zh: 我又没办法控制我爱谁！

translation.en: You forget that I introduced you to his greatness.
translation.zh: 你忘了是我把他介绍给你的

translation.en: He's my soul mate. Do you know he has a new song?
translation.zh: 他可是我的灵魂伴侣他出新歌了吗？

translation.en: -More like a whole album. -Are you serious? I've missed so much.
translation.zh: -出了一整张专辑呢-真的？我真是错过了太多

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Hey, Google, play "Drive" by Koop.
translation.zh: 对 嘿 谷歌 播放库普的《兜风》

translation.en: -Impromptu dance party! -Impromptu dance party!
translation.zh: -即兴热舞派对！-即兴热舞派对！

translation.en: I knew you'd love it!
translation.zh: 我就知道你会喜欢的

translation.en: Hey, hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: I'm gonna bring it low again. I'm gonna bring it low again.
translation.zh: 我要再跳低一点 再跳低一点

translation.en: She's goin'. She's goin'. She's goin', goin', goin'.
translation.zh: 跳起来了！

translation.en: -I like this! -[Lisa laughing]
translation.zh: 我喜欢！

translation.en: You got good moves.
translation.zh: 你舞技真棒

translation.en: -There you are. -I don't need food anymore.
translation.zh: -给你-我不需要吃东西了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -Sorry. -That's okay.
translation.zh: -抱歉-没关系

translation.en: I can't imagine a world without cold noodles.
translation.zh: 我简直无法想象一个没有冷面的世界

translation.en: I think I had more dinners at your house than at my own.
translation.zh: 我感觉我在你家吃的饭要比在自己家吃的还多

translation.en: Especially during my dad's cooking learning curve. Remember that?
translation.zh: 尤其是我爸刚学做饭那会儿还记得吗？

translation.en: -You know my parents love you. -I love them.
translation.zh: -你知道我父母很爱你的-我也爱他们

translation.en: Look, I know that you thought your dad was overprotective.
translation.zh: 我知道你认为你爸有点保护过度

translation.en: Smothering. But he did the best he could, Cassie.
translation.zh: -令人窒息-可他已经尽力了 凯茜

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm starting to realize that. -["Drive" ends]
translation.zh: 是啊 我开始意识到这点了

translation.en: -[video game music playing] -[Cassie] Is that next door?
translation.zh: 那是隔壁的声音吗？

translation.en: Doesn't that get annoying?
translation.zh: 这样不会很烦人吗？

translation.en: I don't find it annoying.
translation.zh: 我不觉得烦人

translation.en: No, no, no! He's just super talented and cute and smart.
translation.zh: 不是！只是他很有才华 帅气又聪明

translation.en: Oh, you still have a crush!
translation.zh: 你还在暗恋呐？

translation.en: What'll you do about this year-long crush?
translation.zh: 那你打算拿这一整年的暗恋怎么办？

translation.en: Absolutely nothing.
translation.zh: 什么也不做

translation.en: We're fine the way we are. I…
translation.zh: 我们现在这样就挺好

translation.en: -I don't wanna mess things up. -What's to mess up?
translation.zh: -我可不想把事情搞砸了-能搞砸什么啊？

translation.en: If you don't go after what you want, how will you get it?
translation.zh: 不争取 怎么能得到呢？

translation.en: Like that job interview.
translation.zh: 那个面试也一样

translation.en: You know you want it, but you didn't even sign up.
translation.zh: 你明知道自己想去可你却连名都没有报

translation.en: -How do you know about that? -I am everywhere. Duh.
translation.zh: -你怎么知道的？-我无处不在

translation.en: For someone who studies bones, you need to get some in your back.
translation.zh: 对于一个研究骨头的人来说你需要挺出脊梁骨来才行

translation.en: -How long have you waited to say that? -When did you declare your major again?
translation.zh: 为了说这话你等了多久？ 你是什么时候选的专业来着？

translation.en: Since you were digging dirt in your backyard,
translation.zh: 自从你在后院里挖泥土开始你就知道你想要做什么

translation.en: you knew what you wanted, and I have always admired that.
translation.zh: 自从你在后院里挖泥土开始你就知道你想要做什么 我一直都对这点很敬佩

translation.en: Really? 'Cause you used to tease me pretty hard about being so work-focused.
translation.zh: 真的吗？ 因为你以前经常嘲笑我围着工作转

translation.en: Okay. Well, that was alive me, and she was so very wrong.
translation.zh: 好吧 那是活着时候的我她真是大错特错

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 对了

translation.en: This is why I'm here.
translation.zh: 这就是我来这里的原因

translation.en: I'm going to get you together with Dreamy Max!
translation.zh: 我是来让你和梦中情人麦克斯在一起的！

translation.en: I am sure that there are more substantial reasons why you're here.
translation.zh: 我很确信 肯定有更重要的原因…

translation.en: No! Shush. Okay, this is my warm-up.
translation.zh: 不 好了 这是我的热身

translation.en: Okay, if we can hear his music, then he can hear ours.
translation.zh: 如果我们能听见他的音乐那他就能听见我们

translation.en: And since you aren't going to go to him, it's time for him to come to you.
translation.zh: 既然你不可能去找他 那就是时候让他来找你了

translation.en: Hey, Google, replay Koop.
translation.zh: 嘿 谷歌 重播库普

translation.en: [louder] Replay Koop. Um, I'm not sure she speaks angel.
translation.zh: -重播库普-她好像听不懂天使语

translation.en: A little help, please?
translation.zh: 帮个忙好吗？

translation.en: Hey, Google, replay Koop.
translation.zh: 嘿 谷歌 重播库普

translation.en: Tell her to go louder. We want it to sound like you're having the best time ever.
translation.zh: 开大声一点 要让人一听就知道你正在玩得昏天黑地才行

translation.en: Curiosity will hit, and he won't be able to stay away. It's science.
translation.zh: 因为好奇心一旦来了他肯定抵挡不了 这是科学

translation.en: Hey, Google, highest volume, please.
translation.zh: 嘿 谷歌 把音量调到最高

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 这就对了

translation.en: -Okay. What do we do now? -Wait for it.
translation.zh: -好了 我们接下来怎么做？-等着就行

translation.en: Three,
translation.zh: 三

translation.en: two…
translation.zh: 二…

translation.en: What happened to one?
translation.zh: 怎么不数一了？

translation.en: Huh. He's shyer than I thought.
translation.zh: 他比我想的还要害羞啊

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Going old school. Knocking on his door.
translation.zh: -等等 你要干嘛去？-我要去敲他的门

translation.en: -What? No! -Yeah. I'm doing it!
translation.zh: -不要！-我去定了！

translation.en: Cassie! So embarrassing!
translation.zh: 凯茜！那样太丢人了！

translation.en: Hi. Hey. Um, I heard you playing music, and I was gonna knock,
translation.zh: 嗨 嘿 我听到你在放音乐我正打算来敲门

translation.en: but then I didn't wanna disturb, so I didn't yet.
translation.zh: 但我又不想打扰你所以我还没来得及敲

translation.en: -Are you having a party in here? -Who, me? No.
translation.zh: -你是在这里开派对吗？-谁啊？我？没有

translation.en: I'm just rockin' out.
translation.zh: 只是音乐听嗨了

translation.en: Hey, is it too loud? 'Cause I can turn it down.
translation.zh: 是不是太大声了？我可以关小的

translation.en: Hey, hey, Google, turn it off.
translation.zh: 嘿 谷歌 关掉

translation.en: No, you didn't have to do that on my account. It's a great song though.
translation.zh: 不 你不用为了我这么做的这首歌很棒

translation.en: -Oh, I can turn it back on. -No, not if you don't want to.
translation.zh: -那我可以再开起来-不 如果你不想的话就不用

translation.en: Sorry. Look, you know how we were saying that we wanted to hang out?
translation.zh: 抱歉 那个 我们之前不是说想要一起玩吗？

translation.en: Well, uh, Koop's actually shooting a music video tomorrow.
translation.zh: 正好库普明天要拍一个音乐视频

translation.en: -What? -My friend's directing it.
translation.zh: -什么？-我朋友是导演

translation.en: He wanted to know if I wanted to visit the set.
translation.zh: 他问了我想不想去拍摄现场看

translation.en: -So, uh, I thought maybe… -He's chickening out. Invite him in.
translation.zh: 所以我就想 或许… -他要退缩了 快请他进来-停

translation.en: -Stop it. -Stop what?
translation.zh: -他要退缩了 快请他进来-停

translation.en: I didn't say anything. Did you say something?
translation.zh: -停什么？-我什么也没说啊 你说的？

translation.en: [coughs] Ask him in.
translation.zh: 请他进来

translation.en: Do you wanna come in? I think I have some wine.
translation.zh: 你想进来吗？我好像有葡萄酒

translation.en: Sure. Yeah. No, I'd… I'd love that.
translation.zh: 嗯 好呀 我很乐意

translation.en: Okay, okay. Cool shoes.
translation.zh: 好的 鞋子挺不错

translation.en: Mmm. You smell clean. A good start.
translation.zh: 闻起来也很干净 头开得不错

translation.en: Yeah, this is pretty much exactly like walking into my place.
translation.zh: 哇 这里就像是走进我自己家一样

translation.en: Except a lot bigger and a lot less stuff.
translation.zh: 只不过地方更大 东西更少

translation.en: A little obvious, Max. My friend is a genius. You can do better.
translation.zh: 有点太明显了 麦克斯我朋友是个天才 想点聪明的出来

translation.en: Shut up. You're a puzzler?
translation.zh: 不可能吧 你是拼图爱好者？

translation.en: I'm a puzzler.
translation.zh: 我也是拼图爱好者

translation.en: Yeah. I can lose myself for days doing one of those.
translation.zh: 是的 我有时候一拼就是好几天

translation.en: -I just started up again. -No way.
translation.zh: -我是刚刚重新开始的-不是吧

translation.en: My best friend Cassie and I, we used to puzzle all the time.
translation.zh: 我和我最好的朋友凯茜以前经常一起拼图

translation.en: Oh, here. I found it in the back of the fridge,
translation.zh: 给你 我在冰箱深处找到的

translation.en: so I'm not sure if it's good.
translation.zh: 所以我也不确定还能不能喝

translation.en: Vintage. Nice.
translation.zh: 年份酒啊 太好了

translation.en: Only the best for you, neighbor.
translation.zh: 当然要拿最好的来招待你 邻居

translation.en: -Cheers. -Cheers.
translation.zh: -干杯-干杯

translation.en: Have you ever been arrested? How is your credit?
translation.zh: 对了 麦克斯 你被逮捕过吗？你的信用分怎么样？

translation.en: -[spits] -Oh, are you okay?
translation.zh: 对了 麦克斯 你被逮捕过吗？你的信用分怎么样？ -你没事吧？-我没事

translation.en: I'm fine.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-我没事

translation.en: It's disgusting. [laughs]
translation.zh: 真恶心

translation.en: Bottoms up.
translation.zh: 我也闷了

translation.en: [coughs] Well, now we're in it together, right?
translation.zh: 现在我们俩打平了

translation.en: Aw, he's adorable.
translation.zh: 他很可爱嘛

translation.en: So it must've, um, been hard, you losing your friend like that.
translation.zh: 就这样失去了朋友你肯定很难过吧？

translation.en: -How long's it been? A year? -This week, yeah.
translation.zh: -多久了？一年？-到这周满一年 嗯

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -我很遗憾-谢谢

translation.en: Though sometimes I just feel like she's actually hovering right over me.
translation.zh: 不过有时我感觉她好像就在我身旁 离我很近

translation.en: I'm in the way. Hint taken. I'll be in your room if you need me.
translation.zh: 我在做电灯泡 听出来了我去你房间里等

translation.en: How are those dinosaurs of yours? They still extinct?
translation.zh: 你的那些恐龙怎么样了？还灭绝着吗？

translation.en: Yeah. That happened.
translation.zh: 是啊 确实

translation.en: Um, yeah, I… I mostly work with fossils.
translation.zh: 嗯 我主要是研究化石

translation.en: I just find something so comforting in… in holding history in your hands.
translation.zh: 我总觉得把历史握在手里这种感觉很让人安心

translation.en: Yeah, I get that. The tangible is easier to believe in, right?
translation.zh: 对 我懂摸得着的东西才更容易相信 对吧？

translation.en: Exactly. Yeah, I've always thought that.
translation.zh: 没错 对 我就是这么想的

translation.en: -On a scale of one to ten… -Mm-hmm. …how big of a Jurassic Park fan are you?
translation.zh: 从1到10的话 你给自己对《侏罗纪公园》的喜爱打几分？

translation.en: -No, like a 20. -[Cassie] Twenty!
translation.zh: -不行 20还差不多-20啊！

translation.en: She watched it all the time!
translation.zh: 她几乎天天看

translation.en: All the time.
translation.zh: 对啊 天天看

translation.en: I… I, um, I watched it a lot.
translation.zh: 我看过好多遍

translation.en: And Indiana Jones.
translation.zh: 还有《夺宝奇兵》

translation.en: I blame my geekiness on those movies actually.
translation.zh: 我这么书呆子气 就怪那些电影

translation.en: I like your geekiness.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢你的书呆子气

translation.en: Late. It's getting late.
translation.zh: 很晚 已经很晚了

translation.en: Um… I…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I have to work tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我明天要上班

translation.en: Yeah, no. Yeah, of course.
translation.zh: 嗯 对 当然了

translation.en: Um, well, look,
translation.zh: 好了 那个

translation.en: thanks for having me. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 谢谢你招待我

translation.en: And for the questionable wine. -[Lisa laughs] -That was great.
translation.zh: 还有那杯可疑的葡萄酒 也非常棒

translation.en: And I'll see you soon. Yeah?
translation.zh: 那我们就改天见 好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: 好呀

translation.en: -Cool. -Cool.
translation.zh: -好-好

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好了-好了

translation.en: -Bye. -Bye.
translation.zh: -再见-再见

translation.en: That was a good-ish start. Now you have to learn how to stick the landing.
translation.zh: 刚才头开得还不赖 接着你就只要学习如何一锤定音

translation.en: I think I really like him.
translation.zh: 我觉得我非常喜欢他

translation.en: Well, then it's good you kicked him out.
translation.zh: 是吗？还好你刚才把他赶出去了

translation.en: Okay. I need to go to bed.
translation.zh: 好吧 我要上床睡觉了

translation.en: And don't watch me sleep tonight. It's creepy.
translation.zh: 晚上别看着我睡觉 怪瘆人的

translation.en: Aye, aye, Captain.
translation.zh: 遵命 船长

translation.en: Proud of you!
translation.zh: 为你骄傲哦！

translation.en: [Lisa] God, I'm so stupid.
translation.zh: 天呐 我真是太蠢了

translation.en: What was I even thinking?
translation.zh: 我到底在想什么啊？

translation.en: Why did I kick him out?
translation.zh: 我干嘛要把他赶出去？

translation.en: I totally blew it.
translation.zh: 全被我搞砸了

translation.en: So stupid.
translation.zh: 太蠢了

translation.en: "Thanks for the wine"? Who says that? Like she's my waiter for the evening.
translation.zh: “谢谢你的葡萄酒”？谁说这种话啊？ 就好像她是我今晚的服务员似的

translation.en: For God's sake, why can't I just ask her out like a normal human being?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 为什么我就不能像个正常人那样约她出去呢？

translation.en: I had the chance, and I blew it.
translation.zh: 这么好的机会被我搞砸了

translation.en: Oh, what was I thinking?
translation.zh: 我到底在想什么啊？

translation.en: -It was like I was leaving a wake. -They really are made for each other.
translation.zh: -搞得好像我刚守完夜似的-他们俩真的是天生一对

translation.en: Oh. "I like your geekiness"? I mean, who says that?
translation.zh: “我喜欢你的书呆子气”？谁说这种话啊？

translation.en: "Hi. I'm Max, your weird neighbor, and you'll never speak to me again."
translation.zh: “我叫麦克斯 你的怪胎邻居你再也不会跟我讲一句话了”

translation.en: Cool. Nice one, dude. Brilliant. Brilliant. What a corker.
translation.zh: 好 干得漂亮 哥们 真是个人才

translation.en: [exhales] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Oh, so cute. [kisses]
translation.zh: 真帅

translation.en: I'm late!
translation.zh: 我迟到了！

translation.en: What? Seriously? I don't have time for this, Cassie!
translation.zh: 什么？有没有搞错？我可没时间玩这个 凯茜！

translation.en: [scoffs] Right.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: [Lisa] Piper, don't forget the rent check!
translation.zh: 派珀 别忘了租金！

translation.en: -["Blush" playing loudly] -Codswallop!
translation.zh: 哎呦喂呀！

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey, sorry. I… I didn't see you there.
translation.zh: -嘿-嘿 抱歉 我没看到你

translation.en: I'm a bit of a mess right now. I'm late for work, and I--
translation.zh: 我现在乱糟糟的我上班要迟到了 而且我…

translation.en: It's okay. I'm on my way, um, to get some coffee.
translation.zh: 没关系 我正要去喝咖啡

translation.en: -Cool. -This is a coincidence.
translation.zh: -好的-真是巧合

translation.en: Yeah, that's… that's one word for it.
translation.zh: 是啊 是可以这么说

translation.en: Listen, I really should have asked this last night,
translation.zh: 这话我本来应该昨晚问的

translation.en: but would you wanna go to that Koop music video thing with me?
translation.zh: 但你愿意跟我一起去看库普拍音乐视频吗？

translation.en: I thought it'd be cool to see what goes on behind--
translation.zh: 我觉得那样会挺不错的 能看到幕后…

translation.en: Yeah. Yes.
translation.zh: 嗯 我愿意

translation.en: Cool. Well, I can pick you up at 4:00, if that works?
translation.zh: 好 如果可以的话 我可以4点来接你

translation.en: I'm not exactly a leave-work-early kinda gal, but, yeah, why not?
translation.zh: 我不是那种提早下班的女生 但是呢 可以 为什么不呢？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, 4:00 is great.
translation.zh: 嗯 4点可以

translation.en: -Don't be late. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 别迟到了

translation.en: What about your coffee?
translation.zh: 你的咖啡呢？

translation.en: Right. Yeah, no. Sorry.
translation.zh: 对 没错 真抱歉

translation.en: I… I forgot I'm actually in the throes of a pretty vicious eBay bidding war
translation.zh: 我忘了我正忙着在易贝上跟别人展开一场激烈的竞标大战

translation.en: over the original VHS of David Bowie's the Labyrinth,
translation.zh: 为了抢大卫·鲍伊的《魔幻迷宫》原版录影带呢

translation.en: and I really should get back to that.
translation.zh: 我应该回去继续了

translation.en: No rest for the wicked and all that. But I will see you later. Yeah?
translation.zh: 忙得不可开交 没时间休息我们晚点见 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah, I'll see you later too. -Bye.
translation.zh: -好的 我们晚点见-再见

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Thanks, fairy godmother.
translation.zh: 多谢了 仙女教母

translation.en: -[Sofia] Am I doing it wrong? -[Morgan] Yes.
translation.zh: -我做错了吗？-嗯

translation.en: -[Sofia] Do I got it now? -[Morgan] Yes.
translation.zh: -现在对了吗？-没

translation.en: Oh. All right. Time to start Project Get Dad Out of his Funk.
translation.zh: 好嘞 是时候开始“让老爸重见天日”计划了

translation.en: What to do first?
translation.zh: 首先该做什么呢？

translation.en: Come on, Dad. You know you're tempted to try this out.
translation.zh: 来吧 爸 你知道你跃跃欲试很久了

translation.en: That's it? Not even a downward dog?
translation.zh: 这就完了？连个下犬式也不做？

translation.en: Your yoga-avoiding daughter is trying to connect here.
translation.zh: 你这个避着瑜伽的女儿在努力跟你交流呢

translation.en: I can take a hint, universe.
translation.zh: 我看懂你的暗示了 宇宙

translation.en: Or Cassie.
translation.zh: 或是凯茜

translation.en: -Ooh, that looks good. -Oh, she always…
translation.zh: -看起来不错嘛-这人总这样

translation.en: -Wear a bell or something. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 挂个铃铛什么的吧

translation.en: Are you trying to shut me out?
translation.zh: 你是想把我拒之门外吗？

translation.en: I don't want people to think that I'm talking to myself.
translation.zh: 我可不想让别人觉得我在自言自语

translation.en: Oh. Look around. Everybody looks like they're talking to themselves.
translation.zh: 看看周围吧每个人看起来都像是在自言自语

translation.en: It's talking to each other we have trouble with.
translation.zh: 人们有困难的是跟彼此交流

translation.en: -Oh, that's surprisingly deep. -I have my moments.
translation.zh: -没想到还挺有深度的嘛-我也会感慨一下

translation.en: It's been one of those days.
translation.zh: 特别是碰上这种不顺利的时候

translation.en: Well, luckily, your best friend is here, even if she is wearing EarPods.
translation.zh: 幸运的是 你最好的朋友在听着呢尽管她带着耳机

translation.en: I'm trying to help my dad.
translation.zh: 我在想办法帮我爸

translation.en: You should see his house. It's a mess. And he stopped doing yoga.
translation.zh: 你去看看他家就知道了 一团糟而且他都不做瑜伽了

translation.en: -Wait, seriously? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-是啊

translation.en: -That is so unlike him. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 这也太不像他了

translation.en: Although you know what? He hasn't posted in a while.
translation.zh: 不过想来也对他是好一阵子没发东西了

translation.en: Yeah. We can't communicate like you and I, so I'm trying to get creative.
translation.zh: 是啊 我跟他没办法像你我这样交流 所以我一直在试各种方法

translation.en: I, uh, I also saw Sofia.
translation.zh: 我还去看了索菲娅

translation.en: She was with her daughter. My half sister, Morgan.
translation.zh: 她跟她女儿在一起我同母异父的妹妹 摩根

translation.en: They were playing at the park. She came to your service.
translation.zh: -她们在公园里玩-她代替了你

translation.en: I wanna be happy for her. I do.
translation.zh: 我很想能替她高兴

translation.en: But seeing her so carefree, you know, it hurts,
translation.zh: 但见到她那么无忧无虑的样子 很伤人 我感觉很愤怒

translation.en: and I get angry, and it's just…
translation.zh: 很伤人 我感觉很愤怒

translation.en: It's not a very angelic reaction, huh?
translation.zh: 这不是一个天使该有的反应

translation.en: I mean, I wouldn't know, but, uh,
translation.zh: 虽然我不懂天使

translation.en: it does sound like a pretty human one.
translation.zh: 但听起来是人类该有的反应

translation.en: I don't know how I'll make things right before my time is up.
translation.zh: 我不知道我要怎么赶在时间到之前把这些事情做好了

translation.en: A little buzz here. Let's see what it is.
translation.zh: 震动了一下 我们来看看是谁

translation.en: Wait! Downward Dad is back!
translation.zh: “下犬爹”回来了！

translation.en: -Whatever you're doing, it's working! -[gasps, laughs]
translation.zh: 不知道你做了什么 反正起效果了！

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: So?
translation.zh: 所以什么？

translation.en: -Are you ready for your big date? -Date? What date?
translation.zh: -你准备好去这场盛大的约会了吗？-什么约会？

translation.en: Are you kidding me? I'm freaking out! Why do you think I'm stress eating?
translation.zh: 你逗我玩吗？我都吓坏了！ 不然你以为我干嘛暴饮暴食？

translation.en: Oh, you're so lucky I came back.
translation.zh: 你真走运 还好我回来了

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 可不是嘛

translation.en: It's okay, right?
translation.zh: 这件还不错 对吧？

translation.en: This is what you wear when you're sick, and you go to CVS for more cough medicine.
translation.zh: 这件衣服是你生病了去药店买咳嗽药时穿的衣服

translation.en: Okay. Hey, now,
translation.zh: 等一下 好吗？

translation.en: we don't all have your never-ending supply of brand-new clothes.
translation.zh: 不是每个人都像你一样有无限多的新衣服穿的

translation.en: Love this one.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这件

translation.en: [gasps] Yes. With red lipstick.
translation.zh: 对 配上大红的唇膏

translation.en: -Okay, don't push it. -Pink lip?
translation.zh: -好了 别太过分了-粉唇？

translation.en: -Fine. -[squeals]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Uh, wait!
translation.zh: 等等！

translation.en: -The pink lip. -The pink lip.
translation.zh: -粉唇-粉唇

translation.en: Let's see.
translation.zh: 我们看看

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I like it. I li-- I don't know. Is it… is it me?
translation.zh: 嗯 我喜欢 我不知道诶 这像我吗？

translation.en: -You look perfect. -Really?
translation.zh: -你看起来很完美-真的吗？

translation.en: That cutie composer won't know what hit him. Come here.
translation.zh: 那个帅哥作曲家肯定会被你迷倒的 来

translation.en: -[knocking at door] -He's here! He's here!
translation.zh: 他来了！

translation.en: -Ah! Wait, wait, wait! -Okay, come on. Let's go!
translation.zh: -等等！-好了 快 我们走！

translation.en: -Wait! One last thing. Hold on. -[spraying]
translation.zh: 等等！还有最后一样 别急

translation.en: -Turn. -Stop spraying me! Stop it! He's here.
translation.zh: -转个身-别喷我了！住手！他来了

translation.en: You look…
translation.zh: 你看起来…

translation.en: Wow. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 哇喔

translation.en: You look wow yourself.
translation.zh: 你看起来也很“哇喔”

translation.en: -After you. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -你先请-谢谢

translation.en: You're welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Mmm. And he has manners.
translation.zh: 而且他还很懂礼貌
