translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你来这里干什么啊？

translation.en: Like I'd miss a chance to see Koop live and in person.
translation.zh: 难道我会错过看库普现场的机会？

translation.en: -Don't worry. You won't know I'm here. -Cassie!
translation.zh: 放心 你不会注意到我在的 凯茜！

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿-嘿

translation.en: -[Max] You all right? -Great.
translation.zh: -你还好吗？-很好

translation.en: ♪ Come on ♪
translation.zh: （一见钟情）

translation.en: ♪ I think I finally found My favorite thing ♪
translation.zh: 我好像终于找到了我最爱的东西

translation.en: ♪ And it's closer than it seems ♪
translation.zh: 它远比看似的要更接近

translation.en: ♪ Open my eyes Girl, can you take me there? ♪
translation.zh: 睁开我的眼睛 女孩你能带我去那儿吗？

translation.en: ♪ Have I seen you in a dream? ♪
translation.zh: 我在梦里见过你吗？

translation.en: ♪ And it feels like, ooh ♪
translation.zh: 那感觉就像 喔

translation.en: ♪ Every time I look at your face Your face ♪
translation.zh: 每当我看着你的脸庞 你的脸庞

translation.en: ♪ It feels like, ooh ♪
translation.zh: 那感觉就像 喔

translation.en: ♪ I'm running, but I'm stuck in one place One place ♪
translation.zh: 我在奔跑着却又像是被困在原地 困在原地

translation.en: ♪ It only takes one look And I'm into you ♪
translation.zh: 我对你是一见钟情

translation.en: ♪ There could be A hundred people in the room ♪
translation.zh: 哪怕房间里有一百个人

translation.en: ♪ If you take a chance You could feel it too ♪
translation.zh: 如果你肯给我个机会 你也会感觉到

translation.en: ♪ All it takes is one look One look, one look ♪
translation.zh: 钟情只需一见 一见 一见

translation.en: ♪ I'm floating higher… ♪
translation.zh: 我漂得越来越高…

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -For what? -Taking us here.
translation.zh: -谢什么？-带我们来这里

translation.en: -We really appreciate it. -We?
translation.zh: -我们非常感激-我们？

translation.en: Did I say we? I meant me. I really appreciate it.
translation.zh: 我说“我们”了吗？ 我是说我 我非常感激

translation.en: Well, I'm really glad you're here.
translation.zh: 我也很高兴你能来

translation.en: ♪ Every time I look at your face Your face ♪
translation.zh: 每当我看着你的脸庞 你的脸庞

translation.en: ♪ It feels like, ooh ♪
translation.zh: 那感觉就像 喔

translation.en: ♪ I'm running But I'm stuck in one place ♪
translation.zh: 我在奔跑着 却又像是被困在原地

translation.en: ♪ It only takes one look And I'm into you… ♪
translation.zh: 我对你是一见钟情…

translation.en: Holy crap.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: ♪ …a hundred people in the room ♪
translation.zh: …房间里有一百个人

translation.en: ♪ If you take a chance You could feel it too ♪
translation.zh: 如果你肯给我个机会 你也会感觉到

translation.en: ♪ All it takes is one look, one look ♪
translation.zh: 钟情只需一见 一见…

translation.en: Way to angel block, Val.
translation.zh: 你还真是会扫兴啊 瓦尔

translation.en: I know you like him, but he's not on your list.
translation.zh: 我知道你喜欢他可他不在你的名单上

translation.en: Can we add him, please? He was right there. I couldn't resist.
translation.zh: 我们可以把他加上去吗？求你了 他刚才这么近 我没控制住

translation.en: Please stop glaring. Your disappointed look is weirding me out.
translation.zh: 请你别再瞪我了 你这副失望的表情让我很不自在

translation.en: Need I remind you that you're still on the clock, young lady?
translation.zh: 需要我提醒你你的时间很有限吗 年轻的女士？

translation.en: You have just two days left, and no one has been marked off your list.
translation.zh: 你就只剩两天了名单上一个人都没有被去掉

translation.en: I'm working on it, okay? This is harder than I thought.
translation.zh: 我已经在努力了这比我想象中的要难

translation.en: You're on track.
translation.zh: 你已经走上正轨了

translation.en: Just stay focused.
translation.zh: 只要你集中精神

translation.en: Open your heart.
translation.zh: 打开你的心房

translation.en: Possibly only a slight upgrade from the back of the fridge.
translation.zh: 可能只比冰箱深处的要好上那么一点点

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Pairs best with regret?
translation.zh: 最适合配后悔喝？

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Uh, to regret.
translation.zh: 敬后悔

translation.en: To regret.
translation.zh: 敬后悔

translation.en: -Cheers. -Cheers.
translation.zh: -喝-喝

translation.en: -Seriously? -Sorry, are we not…
translation.zh: -有没有搞错？-抱歉 我们不是…

translation.en: -I'm-- Sorry. -Are you okay?
translation.zh: -对不起-你没事吧？

translation.en: My knee cramped up.
translation.zh: 我的膝盖抽筋了

translation.en: I can't believe the terrible timing for a pain like that. It's--
translation.zh: 真不敢相信这种时候痛了起来

translation.en: I thought this was… Are we not a thing, or am I just confused?
translation.zh: 我以为这是…我们不来电吗？还是说我搞错了？

translation.en: Max, no, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 麦克斯 不是 我很抱歉

translation.en: I'm just… I'm a little nervous and edgy, and I've got a lot going on.
translation.zh: 我有点紧张和激动最近发生了很多事

translation.en: Full confession.
translation.zh: 我向你完全坦白

translation.en: I…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I have liked you since the first time we met.
translation.zh: 自从我们第一次见面我就喜欢上你了

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Oh.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Full confession. I've liked you since then too.
translation.zh: 我向你完全坦白我也是从那时起就喜欢你了

translation.en: And I may regret saying this out loud, but…
translation.zh: 还有 这话说出来我可能会后悔 但…

translation.en: I still have this overwhelming desire to kiss you.
translation.zh: 我还是有一种强烈的想要吻你的冲动

translation.en: [softly] I like confessions.
translation.zh: 我喜欢坦白

translation.en: You have that good-date glow.
translation.zh: 约会顺利 容光焕发啊

translation.en: -He wants to go back out again. -[exclaims]
translation.zh: 他又约我出去了

translation.en: -Sorry for crashing. -[sighs] I was, uh, non-living vicariously through you.
translation.zh: 很抱歉打扰你们我刚才可真是个不速之客

translation.en: It's okay. Just… just do me a favor and maybe don't come on any of our other dates.
translation.zh: 没关系 但请你帮我一把下次别挑我们约会的时候来

translation.en: No chaperone.
translation.zh: 不要监护人

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Got it.
translation.zh: 明白了

translation.en: -I'm glad it went well. -Oh, it really did.
translation.zh: -这么顺利 我很高兴-真的很顺利

translation.en: We spent the entire night just talking.
translation.zh: 我们一整晚都在聊天

translation.en: He's so interesting.
translation.zh: 他这个人真有趣

translation.en: He knows all of these obscure bands.
translation.zh: 他知道好多冷门的乐队

translation.en: Plus, um, he even got me this blanket before I said I was cold.
translation.zh: 而且他在我说我冷之前就跟我拿了条毯子来

translation.en: Oh, and he smells really, really good. -Like pine and pizza. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 而且他闻起来很香就像是松木和比萨

translation.en: -You're falling for him. -Yeah, I am.
translation.zh: -你要爱上他了-对 是的

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Why are you crying?
translation.zh: 你为什么哭啊？

translation.en: These aren't sad tears.
translation.zh: 这不是悲伤的泪水

translation.en: -Yeah, but they're still tears. -This is your time. It's not about me.
translation.zh: -那也是泪水啊-现在重点是你 我怎么样不重要

translation.en: It's just…
translation.zh: 只是…

translation.en: I guess it's starting to hit me that I'm never gonna have a first kiss again,
translation.zh: 我才刚刚意识到我再也不会有第一次接吻了

translation.en: or go on an amazing date, or go on a bad date.
translation.zh: 或是来一场很棒的约会 又或者… 来一场很糟糕的约会

translation.en: But worst of all,
translation.zh: 但最糟糕的是

translation.en: I'm not gonna be here to watch all your career successes.
translation.zh: 我没办法看着你获得事业上的一个个成功了

translation.en: I won't be here to watch you walk down the aisle and become a mother.
translation.zh: 我没办法在这里看着你结婚成为母亲

translation.en: And, oh, you're gonna be an amazing mom, Lis. Thanks.
translation.zh: -你肯定会是个很棒的妈妈 丽莎-谢谢

translation.en: [voice cracking] Your kids are always gonna know they're loved.
translation.zh: 你的孩子们肯定无时无刻都知道自己是被爱着的

translation.en: Plus, they're gonna… [sighs deeply]
translation.zh: 而且啊 他们还会…

translation.en: …dominate the science fair.
translation.zh: 在科学展上出尽风头

translation.en: -Oh, they will, won't they? -[chuckles] Yeah.
translation.zh: -那是当然的 对吧？-是啊

translation.en: Sorry, maybe these are sad tears. [laughs]
translation.zh: 对不起 也许这些真是悲伤的泪水

translation.en: This isn't fair.
translation.zh: 这不公平

translation.en: No one should have to die young.
translation.zh: 谁都不应该英年早逝

translation.en: I have to believe there's a reason for it.
translation.zh: 我不得不相信 这样是有原因的

translation.en: Even if I don't know what it is yet.
translation.zh: 尽管我现在还不知道

translation.en: -This is all my fault. -No!
translation.zh: -这都是我的错-不！

translation.en: If I'd just stayed there with you that night, then none of this would've even happened.
translation.zh: 如果那晚我和你待在一起这一切都不会发生

translation.en: No. This was gonna happen no matter what you did. It was my time.
translation.zh: 无论你怎么做 这些都会发生的是我的大限到了

translation.en: When… when you were a kid, and your parents would fight,
translation.zh: 你小时候父母吵架时

translation.en: I was the one who would distract you with a puzzle.
translation.zh: 我总会拿拼图出来 帮你分心

translation.en: Yeah, and you had extra PJs for me whenever I didn't wanna go home.
translation.zh: 我不想回家的时候你总会有一套额外的睡衣

translation.en: -You've always been there for me. -But that night, I wasn't.
translation.zh: -你总在我身边支持我-可那天晚上我没有

translation.en: I mean, I heard you coming to my door, and I…
translation.zh: 我明明听到了你走到我的门口来 而我…

translation.en: I have been mad at myself ever since.
translation.zh: 自从那天起 我一直在生自己的气

translation.en: -Hey. -[sniffs]
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Don't be.
translation.zh: 别这样

translation.en: In a weird way, what happened is a good thing.
translation.zh: 从某种程度上来说 这是件好事

translation.en: Now… now you get to live your own life
translation.zh: 你现在终于可以过自己的生活

translation.en: and don't have to worry about taking care of me anymore.
translation.zh: 不用再担心要怎么照顾我了

translation.en: You don't mean that.
translation.zh: 你不能真这么想

translation.en: I can't lie. I'm almost an angel.
translation.zh: 我说不了谎 我差点就是天使了

translation.en: Well,
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I'd like to be there for you one last time.
translation.zh: 我想要最后陪在你身边支持你一回

translation.en: I don't know why I'm supposed to care about her.
translation.zh: 我不知道我为什么要在乎她

translation.en: She left me, you know?
translation.zh: 是她离开我的 你知道吗？

translation.en: But she's on my list, so… [exhales]
translation.zh: 可她在我的名单上 所以…

translation.en: Well, hey, if you don't care, then why keep her postcards?
translation.zh: 可是 如果你真不在乎你为什么要留下她的明信片呢？

translation.en: How can I help you with your mom?
translation.zh: 你妈的事 我要怎么帮你？

translation.en: I can't believe she lives here.
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信她住在这里

translation.en: This is exactly what she ran away from.
translation.zh: 这就是她逃离的生活

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi. I was so glad you called.
translation.zh: -嗨-嗨 你打来电话 我真的很高兴

translation.en: Come in.
translation.zh: 进来吧

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I, um, thought we could catch up on the patio.
translation.zh: 我们可以去院子里叙叙旧

translation.en: I made lemonade. Would you like some? I have tea.
translation.zh: 我做了柠檬水 要来点吗？我还有茶…

translation.en: I have one of those Jarritos. You used to love those.
translation.zh: 我还有加锐得汽水你以前可喜欢喝了

translation.en: Um, I think water is fine. Thanks.
translation.zh: 我喝水就行 谢谢

translation.en: -[Sofia] How are you, Lisa? -Good.
translation.zh: -你好吗 丽莎？-好的

translation.en: -[Sofia] Still working at the museum? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -还在博物馆工作吗？-对

translation.en: [Lisa] Yeah, it's been busy, but it's been really good.
translation.zh: 是啊 一直很忙 但非常顺利

translation.en: -[Sofia] Good. -How are you?
translation.zh: -那就好-你好吗？

translation.en: [Sofia] Busy. Busy with Morgan.
translation.zh: 忙着带摩根

translation.en: -This is Morgan. -Oh, let me see.
translation.zh: -这就是摩根-让我看看

translation.en: -Oh, she's so cute! -She's like Cassie in a lot of ways.
translation.zh: -她好可爱啊-她在很多方面都很像凯茜

translation.en: Yeah, look, she's got that same mischievous grin.
translation.zh: 是啊 看 她也有那副坏坏的笑容

translation.en: They would've liked each other. I always wanted to introduce them,
translation.zh: 她们肯定会很喜欢对方的 我本来想介绍她们认识

translation.en: but I wanted Cassie and I to be okay first.
translation.zh: 可我想让凯茜和我先相处好

translation.en: I'd like to get started.
translation.zh: 我想开始了

translation.en: So,
translation.zh: 是这样的

translation.en: I found these in Cassie's box of keepsakes.
translation.zh: 我找到了凯茜保存着的这么一盒东西

translation.en: She kept them?
translation.zh: 她全留着？

translation.en: It was my only way to know you. Tell her that, please.
translation.zh: 这是我了解你的唯一途径 把这话告诉她

translation.en: Yeah. I think they made her feel closer to you.
translation.zh: 我想它们能让她觉得离你更近一些

translation.en: I used to read her Mary Poppins. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我以前会读《欢乐满人间》给她听

translation.en: She always wanted to see London. Did she ever go?
translation.zh: 她一直都很想去看看伦敦她后来有去过吗？

translation.en: No, I didn't go anywhere. I was hoping you would come back to me.
translation.zh: 我什么地方都没去整天希望着你会回来找我

translation.en: No, she didn't.
translation.zh: 不 她没有

translation.en: Too bad. She would have loved it.
translation.zh: 真可惜 她肯定会很喜欢的

translation.en: Mmm. Her first crush, actually, was this guy who moved here from England.
translation.zh: 她第一次喜欢上的人就是从英国搬过来的

translation.en: -Ian. -[Lisa] Ian.
translation.zh: -伊恩-伊恩

translation.en: It's one of the many things we have… had in common.
translation.zh: 这也是我们的共同点… 曾经的共同点之一

translation.en: I missed so much of her life.
translation.zh: 我错过了这么多她的人生

translation.en: It must have been confusing for her, dealing with boys and dating.
translation.zh: 对她来说肯定很迷茫对付男生还有谈恋爱什么的

translation.en: Yeah, but my mom was there for both of us to answer some of the tough questions, so…
translation.zh: 是啊 但有我妈帮助我们俩 回答了不少这样困难的问题

translation.en: Ask her why she left.
translation.zh: 问她为什么离开

translation.en: I'm sure that this is, like, really hard to talk about, but, um…
translation.zh: 我相信这件事很难说出来

translation.en: Cassie always wanted to know why you left.
translation.zh: 但凯茜一直很想知道你为什么会离开

translation.en: There's not one reason.
translation.zh: 并不是只有一个原因

translation.en: What did I do to make you leave?
translation.zh: 我做了什么才让你离开？

translation.en: Was it something Cassie did?
translation.zh: 是凯茜做了什么吗？

translation.en: No, never.
translation.zh: 不 怎么可能

translation.en: Cassie, she was an angel.
translation.zh: 凯茜 她就是个天使

translation.en: It was all me.
translation.zh: 都是我的错

translation.en: I…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I was young.
translation.zh: 我那时候很年轻

translation.en: And I thought I knew more than anyone around me.
translation.zh: 自以为自己知道的比周围的人都多

translation.en: Sounds like Cassie.
translation.zh: 听起来很像凯茜

translation.en: I, uh, had this romantic idea of what I thought being a wife and mother was like.
translation.zh: 我对做妻子和母亲有一个很浪漫的想象

translation.en: But in reality,
translation.zh: 但现实中

translation.en: I wasn't ready to be responsible for anyone.
translation.zh: 我没做好为任何人负责的准备

translation.en: Looking back at it, I see how patient and loving Howie was,
translation.zh: 现在回头看我能看出霍伊有多耐心和有爱

translation.en: but at the time,
translation.zh: 可在当时

translation.en: I found that suffocating.
translation.zh: 这让我有种窒息的感觉

translation.en: I said the same thing.
translation.zh: 我也说过一样的话

translation.en: For a while, Howie used to send me
translation.zh: 有好一阵子 霍伊都会发给我

translation.en: pictures and letters,
translation.zh: 一些照片和信

translation.en: telling me about her.
translation.zh: 告诉我她的近况

translation.en: I never knew that.
translation.zh: 我不知道有这事

translation.en: But I was too ashamed to respond, so he stopped.
translation.zh: 但我羞于回应 于是他停止了

translation.en: I convinced myself that postcards were an adequate placeholder,
translation.zh: 我说服了自己寄些明信片就算当了妈了

translation.en: and one day I'd be able to explain it all, and we'd actually laugh about it.
translation.zh: 觉得将来有一天我会有机会解释我们俩都能一笑了之

translation.en: Sounds so ridiculous when I say it out loud.
translation.zh: 听我这样大声说出来这话真是太荒谬了

translation.en: I… I let her down.
translation.zh: 我让她失望了

translation.en: The last time I saw her was college graduation,
translation.zh: 我最后一次见她是在大学毕业典礼上

translation.en: and we were like strangers.
translation.zh: 我俩就像陌生人一样

translation.en: I remember.
translation.zh: 我记得

translation.en: Now it's too late to make it right.
translation.zh: 现在一切都为时已晚 没办法弥补了

translation.en: And I'll never forgive myself for that.
translation.zh: 我一辈子也没办法原谅自己

translation.en: Okay, I've heard enough. [clears throat] I need to go.
translation.zh: 好了 我听够了 我要走了

translation.en: If Cassie was here right now,
translation.zh: 假如凯茜现在就在这里

translation.en: what would you say to her?
translation.zh: 你会对她说什么？

translation.en: What are you doing? I didn't ask that.
translation.zh: 你干什么啊？我可没要你这样问

translation.en: That I regret not taking her to London.
translation.zh: 我很后悔没带她去伦敦

translation.en: I should have been there
translation.zh: 我应该在她身边陪着她

translation.en: to help her with her homework,
translation.zh: 帮她一起做回家作业

translation.en: hold her when she had a nightmare.
translation.zh: 在她做噩梦时抱着她

translation.en: I made a lot of selfish decisions.
translation.zh: 我做了很多自私的决定

translation.en: But one thing that never changed--
translation.zh: 但有一件事一直没有变

translation.en: One thing that never changed was my love for her. [clears throat]
translation.zh: 这件事就是我对她的爱

translation.en: If Cassie were here…
translation.zh: 假如凯茜在这里

translation.en: I would tell her that the day she was born
translation.zh: 我会告诉她 她出生的那一天

translation.en: was one of the brightest moments of my life.
translation.zh: 是我此生最开心的时刻之一

translation.en: And running away,
translation.zh: 而逃走

translation.en: it was my worst.
translation.zh: 是我此生最糟糕的时刻

translation.en: I just hope she knows how sorry I am.
translation.zh: 我只希望她能知道我有多抱歉

translation.en: She does.
translation.zh: 她知道的

translation.en: She knows.
translation.zh: 她知道的

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: [Lisa] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: How are we supposed to we finish this if we don't have all the pieces?
translation.zh: 如果没有全部的碎片那我们要怎么把图拼完啊？

translation.en: God, this is so frustrating. Why did you even choose this puzzle?
translation.zh: 这真是太令人沮丧了你为什么要选这个拼图？

translation.en: Uh, you sure you wanna talk about the puzzle?
translation.zh: 你确定你想要聊的是拼图吗？

translation.en: Do you know how hard it was not being able to say everything I wanted to her?
translation.zh: 你知道有话想说却不能说的滋味有多让人难受吗？

translation.en: I really don't.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: I have years of questions.
translation.zh: 这么多年来 我有这么多的问题

translation.en: Yet standing next to her, I found that I just wanted to yell or run away.
translation.zh: 可当我站在她身边时却发现自己只想大吼或是逃走

translation.en: Like mother, like daughter.
translation.zh: 有其母必有其女

translation.en: Yeah, but you didn't, and that's a really good thing.
translation.zh: 可你没有 这样非常好

translation.en: Would you have translated if I did?
translation.zh: 如果我那样 你会替我转达吗？

translation.en: It upset me that you took the conversation over.
translation.zh: 当你自己做主把对话抢过去后我感到非常生气

translation.en: No, no. I didn't take anything over.
translation.zh: 不 我什么都没抢

translation.en: I could tell that she needed to talk to you,
translation.zh: 我看得出 她有话想要跟你说

translation.en: and you needed to hear what she had to say.
translation.zh: 而你也需要听到她要说的话

translation.en: That was for me to decide!
translation.zh: 那也要我自己来决定！

translation.en: -I'm on your side, Cassie. -Ugh.
translation.zh: 我是站在你这边的 凯茜

translation.en: I could tell she needed to talk. You needed to hear what she had to say!
translation.zh: 我看出她有话想要跟你说 你也需要听到她要说的话

translation.en: You don't get it!
translation.zh: 你根本不明白！

translation.en: How could you?
translation.zh: 你怎么能这样？

translation.en: You have a perfect life, a perfect future. I have none of those.
translation.zh: 你有一个完美的人生一个完美的未来 这些我都没有

translation.en: Okay, okay. You're mad at your mom. That's totally understandable, but…
translation.zh: 好了 你在生你妈的气 这我完全理解 可是…

translation.en: You know what? It's… [sighs]
translation.zh: 你知道吗？你…

translation.en: It's not okay for you to take it out on me.
translation.zh: 你这样全发泄在我身上是不对的

translation.en: Sorry. Does my messy non-life make you uncomfortable?
translation.zh: 真抱歉是不是我混乱的鬼生让你不舒服了？

translation.en: Here we go again. Classic.
translation.zh: 又来了 经典

translation.en: I died before I ever got a chance to live!
translation.zh: 我连真正的生活还没开始就死掉了！

translation.en: Well, I'm hurt too! Did you think about that, huh?
translation.zh: 这件事 我也很受伤！你有没有想过？

translation.en: God, after our fight,
translation.zh: 天哪！在我们吵完架后

translation.en: after you left, I had to carry around the guilt of our fight.
translation.zh: 在你离开之后我走到哪儿都带着我们吵架的愧疚

translation.en: I had to pick up the pieces, put my life back together without you.
translation.zh: 收拾残局 在没有你的情况下把生活继续下去

translation.en: Well, you did a great job. Look around! There's nothing left of me!
translation.zh: 你做得很棒 看看周围 根本没有我的痕迹

translation.en: I've been reduced to a box of knickknacks!
translation.zh: 我就只剩下一个小盒子的摆设而已

translation.en: After everything that's happened, I can't believe we're back to arguing.
translation.zh: 在发生了这么多事后我真不敢相信我们还在吵架

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Well, I'm dead,
translation.zh: 反正我已经死了

translation.en: so you don't have to worry about arguing with me ever again.
translation.zh: 你再也不用担心跟我吵架了

translation.en: You cannot bring that anger in here.
translation.zh: 你不能带着这份愤怒进来

translation.en: Look, I… I met with my mom. I got Lisa a boyfriend.
translation.zh: 我见了我妈 还给丽莎找了个男朋友

translation.en: I've been talking to my dad even though he can't hear me.
translation.zh: 我还跟我爸谈过了尽管他听不到我说话

translation.en: Isn't that enough? Do I have to go back?
translation.zh: 这些还不够吗？还得让我回去？

translation.en: Well, not if you don't want to.
translation.zh: 如果你不想的话就不用回

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Well, then, why don't I just walk you over to the elevator?
translation.zh: 好 不如就让我陪你走到电梯那边去

translation.en: When you get there, hit "B" for Below.
translation.zh: 等你到了那边后 按下“B”键去下面

translation.en: -Very funny. I get it. -No, you don't.
translation.zh: -真搞笑 我懂了-不 你不懂

translation.en: Why would you risk throwing away everything you've worked toward?
translation.zh: 你好不容易得来的进展为什么要这样全丢掉？

translation.en: And over an argument?
translation.zh: 就因为一场争吵？

translation.en: You were doing so well.
translation.zh: 你这两天做得这么好

translation.en: -You think I'm doing well? -Yes, I do. Don't you?
translation.zh: -你觉得我做得好？-对 你不觉得吗？

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe.
translation.zh: 我不知道 也许吧

translation.en: I hoped I wouldn't have to tell you this, but here we are.
translation.zh: 我原本希望不用跟你说这个的但现在不得不说了

translation.en: If you really want this to end now, I can make that happen.
translation.zh: 如果你真想立刻把一切结束掉的话 我现在就能帮你

translation.en: But just know, if you leave the list unfinished,
translation.zh: 但你要知道 如果你没完成名单

translation.en: then all the good you've been doing will be undone.
translation.zh: 你所做的一切好事 全都会被抹去

translation.en: Poof.
translation.zh: 噗

translation.en: Everything?
translation.zh: 一切？

translation.en: Lisa?
translation.zh: 丽莎？

translation.en: My dad? Everything.
translation.zh: -我爸？-所有一切

translation.en: Oh, that's… that's terrible.
translation.zh: 那也太糟糕了

translation.en: I can't… I can't do that to them.
translation.zh: 我不能这么对他们

translation.en: -[exhales sharply] -So, you've made your decision?
translation.zh: 那你决定好了吗？

translation.en: Dad, I really need to talk--
translation.zh: 爸 我真的很需要跟你谈…

translation.en: -What is she doing here? -More tea?
translation.zh: -她来这里做什么？-再来点茶？

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I still can't believe you left your accounting practice
translation.zh: 我到现在也不敢相信你不做会计

translation.en: to open a yoga studio.
translation.zh: 开了一家瑜伽工作室

translation.en: You always joked about it, but I never thought you'd actually do it.
translation.zh: 你以前开玩笑说过但我怎么也想不到你会真这么做

translation.en: [Howard] I also joked about becoming a drummer in an '80s cover band.
translation.zh: 我还开玩笑说过要给一个80年代翻唱乐队做鼓手呢

translation.en: -[chuckles] I remember that one. -This was a better lifestyle choice.
translation.zh: -这我记得-这个选择更适合我的生活方式

translation.en: [chuckles] It suits you.
translation.zh: 很适合你

translation.en: You might not have said that a few days ago.
translation.zh: 换了几天前 你可能就不会这么说了

translation.en: This past year has been a challenge.
translation.zh: 过去的这一年是个很大的挑战

translation.en: [Sofia] You know, Lisa visited me today.
translation.zh: 丽莎今天来看了我

translation.en: I know this may sound nutty.
translation.zh: 我知道这么说听起来很离谱

translation.en: During that visit, it…
translation.zh: 但她来看我的时候

translation.en: it was almost as though Cassie were standing right beside me.
translation.zh: 感觉好像凯茜就站在我身边似的

translation.en: I know what you mean.
translation.zh: 我懂你的意思

translation.en: She was a lot like you though.
translation.zh: 她跟你很相像

translation.en: Fearless, independent.
translation.zh: 无畏、独立

translation.en: She'd dive headfirst into… [chuckles] …any situation.
translation.zh: 遇上任何情况 她总会先做了再说

translation.en: But more than anything,
translation.zh: 最重要的是 她充满了活力

translation.en: she was this force of energy who lit up every room she entered.
translation.zh: 最重要的是 她充满了活力 能点亮每一个房间

translation.en: After Lisa left, I, um…
translation.zh: 在丽莎离开后 我…

translation.en: I had this overwhelming urge to see you.
translation.zh: 我有一种强烈的冲动要来见你

translation.en: I just need you to know how deeply sorry I am for walking out.
translation.zh: 我只是想让你知道我对于抛弃你们有多歉疚

translation.en: It wasn't how I saw life going, that's for sure.
translation.zh: 那确实不是我预料到的人生方向

translation.en: Your leaving forced me to become a better man, a better parent,
translation.zh: 但你的离开迫使我变成了一个更好的男人 一个更好的家长

translation.en: even when she didn't want me to,
translation.zh: 尽管她不想让我这样

translation.en: and I hope that in some way I was able to minimize whatever scars she had.
translation.zh: 我希望在某种程度上我已经将她所受的伤痕减到最小

translation.en: Yeah, I know you did.
translation.zh: 我确信你做到了

translation.en: [clears throat] Look, I've kept you long enough.
translation.zh: 我已经打扰你太久了

translation.en: Thanks for this. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: You know, I don't know if it's the palo santo in the air
translation.zh: 我不知道是因为空气中圣檀木的香味

translation.en: or this dandelion tea talking,
translation.zh: 还是喝了这个蒲公英茶

translation.en: but I feel as though Cassie, wherever she is--
translation.zh: 但我觉得凯茜虽然不知道她在哪里 好像…

translation.en: Brought us back together.
translation.zh: 又让我们俩在一起了

translation.en: [Cassie] Mom, wait!
translation.zh: 妈 等等！

translation.en: I forgive you.
translation.zh: 我原谅你了

translation.en: So proud of you.
translation.zh: 我真为你骄傲

translation.en: That felt good.
translation.zh: 这感觉真好

translation.en: I can tell. I mean, you seem lighter.
translation.zh: 我能看出来 你看起来整个人都轻了

translation.en: Hey, so, um…
translation.zh: 嘿 是这样的

translation.en: I need a favor. It's for a good cause, I swear!
translation.zh: 我需要你帮个忙是为了做好事 我发誓！

translation.en: No swearing.
translation.zh: 不许说脏话

translation.en: I didn't actually swear!
translation.zh: 我没有说脏话啊！

translation.en: There's this bakery, and the owner seems like a really thoughtful person.
translation.zh: 有那么一家烘焙店主人似乎是个非常贴心的人

translation.en: I know she's not on my list, but I think I can help her and help my dad.
translation.zh: 我知道她不在我的名单上 但我觉得我能帮她一下 并且帮我爸

translation.en: We're not running a matchmaking service here.
translation.zh: 我们可不是干婚介服务的

translation.en: I know, but they could both use a kind person in their life.
translation.zh: 我明白 但我觉得他俩都需要伴侣

translation.en: This could also be a thank-you to Emme for being such a good friend to Lisa since I've been gone.
translation.zh: 这也算是对艾米的一种感谢感谢她做丽莎的好朋友

translation.en: I've never had anyone want to add to their list before.
translation.zh: 我还从没见过任何一个想要在名单上加名字的人

translation.en: I've also never had anyone like you before.
translation.zh: 但像你这样的人我也是头一回见

translation.en: [clicks tongue] I'll allow it.
translation.zh: 我批准了

translation.en: -[exclaiming] Thank you! -Oh!
translation.zh: 谢谢你！

translation.en: You're the best! Thank you! Thank you!
translation.zh: 你最棒了！谢谢！

translation.en: Yeah, but you're still on the same timeline. Tomorrow is your last day, Cassie.
translation.zh: 可你的时限还是没有变明天是你的最后一天

translation.en: I got this. [sighs]
translation.zh: 我可以的

translation.en: Perfect.
translation.zh: 完美

translation.en: I can't leave it like this. It's a bakery, not Grandma's basement.
translation.zh: 我可不能放手不管这是一家烘焙坊 不是奶奶的地下室

translation.en: Are you behind this too, Cassie?
translation.zh: 你也是你干的吗 凯茜？

translation.en: I like your faith in me, Dad.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你对我的信任 爸

translation.en: [Sofia] Morgan, mijita, are you dressed?
translation.zh: 摩根 女儿 穿好衣服了吗？

translation.en: [in Spanish] We're leaving in five minutes.
translation.zh: 我们五分钟后就出发了

translation.en: [in English] We don't wanna be late again.
translation.zh: 可不要再迟到咯

translation.en: Would you like some tea?
translation.zh: 你想来喝点茶吗？

translation.en: You can see me?
translation.zh: 你能看见我？

translation.en: I saw you at the park too.
translation.zh: 我在公园里也看见你了

translation.en: Aren't you scared?
translation.zh: 你不害怕吗？

translation.en: You're my guardian angel.
translation.zh: 你是我的守护天使

translation.en: Ask your mom to read this to you.
translation.zh: 让妈妈读这个给你听

translation.en: I will.
translation.zh: 我会的

translation.en: This is our secret, okay?
translation.zh: 这是我们之间的秘密 好吗？

translation.en: [woman whispers] Dr. Redding.
translation.zh: 雷丁博士

translation.en: I wish Cassie was here.
translation.zh: 要是凯茜在这里就好了

translation.en: [Cassie] I'm right here.
translation.zh: 我就在这里

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: I do have a piece of you.
translation.zh: 我这里确实有你的一部分

translation.en: -It's from our very first puzzle. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -这是我们拼的第一幅图上的-是啊

translation.en: It's, uh, it's kinda like my lucky charm.
translation.zh: 算是我的幸运符

translation.en: I thought you were done with me.
translation.zh: 我还以为你再也不理我了

translation.en: There are no grudges in the afterlife.
translation.zh: 人死后是不留怨恨的

translation.en: Are there any here?
translation.zh: 你这里还有留吗？

translation.en: No. No, no. I do not wanna lose any more time with you.
translation.zh: 没有 我不想再失去任何一秒与你一起的时间了

translation.en: -[sobs] Neither do I. -[whispering] No, no, no!
translation.zh: -我也不想-不要！

translation.en: -I don't think I can explain an air hug. -Good point.
translation.zh: -我可没办法解释为什么要抱空气-有道理

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Okay, so what's the problem? Why are you hesitating?
translation.zh: 那么 有什么问题吗？你在犹豫什么？

translation.en: This is yours to lose.
translation.zh: 一定要报名

translation.en: Yeah, exactly.
translation.zh: 是啊 没错

translation.en: Cassie, what if I don't get it? What then?
translation.zh: 可要是我没被选上呢？

translation.en: You'll survive, and you'll go on to something even better.
translation.zh: 那你也不会死啊你可以继续去做更好的事

translation.en: No. No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [sighs] Look at me. Do you want this?
translation.zh: 看着我 你想要这份工作吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Are you the best person for this job?
translation.zh: -想啊-你是最能胜任这份工作的人吗？

translation.en: [hesitates] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I'm not buying that yeah. You gotta try again. Are you the best person for this?
translation.zh: 我不相信 你得再说一次你是最能胜任这份工作的人吗？

translation.en: Yeah! I am the best person for this!
translation.zh: 对！我就是最能胜任这份工作的人！

translation.en: Yes! There's my strong friend! Life is too short to be fearful.
translation.zh: 我坚定的朋友回来了！人生苦短 没时间畏手畏脚

translation.en: Yeah, Cassie, I eat, I sleep, I drink this job.
translation.zh: 对啊 凯茜我吃饭睡觉喝水都在为这份工作准备

translation.en: If I got this job, I'd crush it so hard, they'd name a freaking fossil after me.
translation.zh: 如果得到了这份工作我肯定会干得非常出色 他们保证会以我来命名化石的

translation.en: -I would-- -Use that energy and go sign up!
translation.zh: -我肯定…-用好这份精神 快去报名吧！

translation.en: Right! Sign up first. Dominate second.
translation.zh: 对哦！先报名 再表现！

translation.en: -Yes. -[exhales sharply, grunts]
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Oh, I've created a monster.
translation.zh: 我创造了一个怪物

translation.en: I love it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: Phew. Bam, bam. Good luck.
translation.zh: 搞定了 祝你好运吧

translation.en: Hi. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I've heard nice things about you, Lisa.
translation.zh: 我听说过了不少对你的称赞 丽莎

translation.en: -Thanks. -I'm glad you decided to interview.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你决定来面试

translation.en: And last too.
translation.zh: 而且还是最后一个报名

translation.en: That's a bold move.
translation.zh: 真是个大胆的举动啊

translation.en: Shows the competition you're not worried about who came before.
translation.zh: 说明你根本不担心在你前面会有怎样的竞争对手

translation.en: Oh, um, I didn't plan that--
translation.zh: 这不是我故意要…

translation.en: Modesty's a myth that was sold to women a long time ago.
translation.zh: “女子该谦逊”是古时候编出来骗女人的

translation.en: Be proud of your work.
translation.zh: 要为自己的工作骄傲

translation.en: Why paleontology?
translation.zh: 为什么选古生物学？

translation.en: I love digging in dirt,
translation.zh: 我很爱挖土

translation.en: and I hated when people told me that it wasn't a proper career for a lady.
translation.zh: 我最讨厌的就是别人告诉我这不是一份适合女士的职业

translation.en: But, uh, mostly, I found it comforting studying what is real.
translation.zh: 但最主要的是 我觉得研究什么是真的很让人感到宽慰

translation.en: With fossils, it's like this tangible connection to the past, you know?
translation.zh: 可以说化石就是某种摸得着的与过去的联系 对吧？

translation.en: But, uh, now I've… I've started learning from what I…
translation.zh: 而如今我开始从一些我看不见的东西那儿

translation.en: I can't see.
translation.zh: 学到了不少

translation.en: -Bye. -Bye.
translation.zh: -再见-再见

translation.en: -Bye. -See you.
translation.zh: -再见-回见

translation.en: Cassie?
translation.zh: 凯茜？

translation.en: -I got it! I got it! -[screaming]
translation.zh: 我成功了！

translation.en: -I got the job! I got it! -You got it! [squeals]
translation.zh: 我拿到这份工作了！ 你成功了！

translation.en: Thank you so much for the push. I couldn't have done it without you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 谢谢你推我一把没有你的话 我是肯定做不到的

translation.en: -It was all you. -No, I can't even believe I did it.
translation.zh: -全都是你的功劳-我真不敢相信我成功了

translation.en: -Um, I can! -This is, like, the best day of my life.
translation.zh: -我敢-这是我人生中最美好的一天

translation.en: -So proud of you! -Thank you.
translation.zh: 我真为你骄傲！

translation.en: So, are you gonna come to Emme's tonight? I'm bringing Max.
translation.zh: 今晚你会来艾米的店里吗？我会带麦克斯来

translation.en: I wouldn't miss it.
translation.zh: 我绝不会错过的

translation.en: You made it!
translation.zh: 你来了！

translation.en: [Emme] Thank you so much for coming.
translation.zh: 感谢你们光临

translation.en: Excuse me. Hello.
translation.zh: 失陪一下 你好

translation.en: I think I'm in the right place?
translation.zh: 我应该是来对地方了？

translation.en: If you're here for the party, then yes, you are. I'm Emme.
translation.zh: 如果你是来参加派对的那就对了 我叫艾米

translation.en: Would you like a homemade fortune cookie?
translation.zh: 你想来一块自制的幸运饼干吗？

translation.en: -Don't mind if I do. -[Emme chuckles]
translation.zh: 那我就不客气了

translation.en: -"You don't need to look any further." -[Emme] Oh.
translation.zh: “你不用再继续寻觅了”

translation.en: I guess this is the right place.
translation.zh: 看来真是来对地方了

translation.en: How did you hear about my little soiree?
translation.zh: 你是从哪儿听说我这个小晚会的？

translation.en: Honestly, my home was filled with your fliers.
translation.zh: 说实话 我家里放满了你的传单

translation.en: No explanation. I have my suspicions, but no one would believe them.
translation.zh: 无缘无故地虽然我有自己的怀疑 但根本没人信

translation.en: Well, since we're being honest,
translation.zh: 那我也把实话告诉你

translation.en: my shop didn't look like this when I closed up last night.
translation.zh: 昨晚我关门时我的店还不是这个样子

translation.en: I woke up this morning, and voilà.
translation.zh: 今早一起床 就成了这样

translation.en: I've got my suspicions too.
translation.zh: 我也有自己的怀疑

translation.en: Someone's either looking out for us, or we need to get our locks changed.
translation.zh: 不是有人在照顾我们就是我们需要把锁换一下了

translation.en: Can I get you a green tea?
translation.zh: 能请你喝杯绿茶吗？

translation.en: -I've got sencha, matcha-- -Matcha?
translation.zh: -我这里有煎茶、抹茶…-抹茶

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -What did you say your name was again? -Howard.
translation.zh: -你叫什么名字来着？-霍华德

translation.en: -Some people call me Howie. -Howard.
translation.zh: -也有人叫我霍伊-霍华德

translation.en: It means "strong heart."
translation.zh: 意思是“坚强的心”

translation.en: Well, that went better than expected.
translation.zh: 发展得比预期还要好

translation.en: It is fascinating the many ways that people can make a living, isn't it?
translation.zh: 说来真有意思人们谋生的手段有这么多

translation.en: -Look at that. -Come on.
translation.zh: -你瞧瞧-快来吧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [Emme] I'd really love to do gluten and dairy-free.
translation.zh: 我很想做些无麸质和无奶制品的东西

translation.en: That's a new development.
translation.zh: 意料之外的新发展啊

translation.en: Come on. I'll introduce you.
translation.zh: 我来介绍你认识

translation.en: [Emme] Hey, look.
translation.zh: 嘿 你看

translation.en: -Hi, Mr. Garcia. -Lisa!
translation.zh: -嗨 加西亚先生-丽莎！

translation.en: -Hi. -Oh!
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -I could ask you the same.
translation.zh: -你怎么来这里了？-我也想问同样的问题呢

translation.en: -Welcome to the party. -Hi, Emme! Hi!
translation.zh: -欢迎来参加派对-嗨 艾米！嗨！

translation.en: She's one of my regulars. And I suspect is some of the reason I had this makeover.
translation.zh: 她是我的常客之一我怀疑也是这里改头换面的原因之一

translation.en: If only I knew how you got in here.
translation.zh: 要是我知道你怎么进来就好了

translation.en: Well, I'll never tell.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 我是不会说的

translation.en: So this is Max. He's, um,
translation.zh: 这位是麦克斯 他是…

translation.en: my…
translation.zh: 我的…

translation.en: [splutters] Boyfriend. Hi.
translation.zh: 男朋友 嗨

translation.en: -Uh, wait, sorry. Is that cool? -One hundred percent.
translation.zh: -等等 抱歉 我能这么说吗？-百分百

translation.en: And how do you two know each other?
translation.zh: 你们俩是怎么认识的？

translation.en: Lisa and my daughter were best friends.
translation.zh: 丽莎和我女儿曾是最要好的朋友

translation.en: -What? Are you Cassie's dad? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -什么？你是凯茜的爸爸？-是啊

translation.en: [Emme] I've heard a lot about her.
translation.zh: 我听说了好多关于她的事

translation.en: Um, I just have to make a call. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我得去打个电话 马上回来

translation.en: -All right. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好的-好

translation.en: Someone has been busy. Are you still playing Cupid?
translation.zh: 看来有人一直在忙活啊 你还在扮演丘比特吗？

translation.en: Can I help it if their paths crossed? [laughs]
translation.zh: 他们碰巧遇上 我又有什么办法？

translation.en: You still can't talk to him, huh?
translation.zh: 你还不是没办法跟他说话？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: It's my last day. But he seems happier, and that's what's important.
translation.zh: 今天是我的最后一天 但他看起来更开心了这才是最重要的

translation.en: Huh.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: What's with the "huh"?
translation.zh: 你“嗯”是什么意思？

translation.en: You can go anywhere I can go, right?
translation.zh: 你可以去任何我能去的地方 对吧？

translation.en: I mean, if I'm needed. Why?
translation.zh: 如果你需要我的话 怎么了？

translation.en: After this party, I need you to find me. No questions asked.
translation.zh: 派对结束后我需要你来找我 不许问为什么

translation.en: -What are you up to? -You're not the only one with surprises.
translation.zh: -你打算搞什么把戏啊？-你又不是唯一会搞惊喜的人

translation.en: You have to find me after and not before, okay?
translation.zh: 你必须在结束后才来找我不能在之前 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好的-好的

translation.en: [Lisa] Hey, everyone.
translation.zh: 大家好

translation.en: I wanna thank you so very much for coming.
translation.zh: 我想要感谢你们的到场

translation.en: We're obviously here because of our beloved Cassie,
translation.zh: 我们来这里当然是为了我们深爱的凯茜

translation.en: um, who left us a year ago this week, but, um,
translation.zh: 她在一年前的这一周离开了我们

translation.en: I really don't want this to be about loss
translation.zh: 但我不想让今晚围绕在失去上

translation.en: because this is also the week that she came into our lives.
translation.zh: 因为这也是她进入我们生命中的一周

translation.en: One thing we know about our Cassie is that her joyous life was a party.
translation.zh: 关于凯茜 有一件事我们都很清楚 那就是她充满欢乐的人生是一场派对

translation.en: Especially the week of her birthday, or as she called it…
translation.zh: 尤其是她生日的那一周按她的叫法也就是…

translation.en: -Cassie-palooza. -Cassie-palooza.
translation.zh: -凯茜狂欢周-凯茜狂欢周

translation.en: [smacks lips] So, these wish lanterns that you're holding
translation.zh: 所以呢 你们手上握着的这些许愿灯

translation.en: will carry whatever you wanna say to her.
translation.zh: 将乘载着你们想要对她说的任何话语

translation.en: And as they float across the water,
translation.zh: 当它们漂到水的那一端时你们的思念

translation.en: your thoughts will be sent to her.
translation.zh: 当它们漂到水的那一端时你们的思念 也会被送到她那里

translation.en: [whispers] Okay, Morgan, why don't you go first? Okay?
translation.zh: 好 摩根 不如就从你开始吧？好吗？

translation.en: Hey. This entire time, I thought I was the one helping all of you, but…
translation.zh: 嘿 这段时间来我一直以为是我在帮助你们

translation.en: all this has me realizing that…
translation.zh: 但是这件事让我意识到

translation.en: you were the ones helping me.
translation.zh: 其实是你们在帮助我

translation.en: I'm not… I'm not ready to lose you again.
translation.zh: 我还没准备好再次失去你

translation.en: We got a second chance. Not everyone can say that.
translation.zh: 我们得到了第二次机会不是每个人都能这样

translation.en: I want you to know you're more than just my best friend
translation.zh: 我想让你知道你不仅仅是我最要好的朋友

translation.en: and my puzzle partner, okay?
translation.zh: 我的拼图拍档

translation.en: You're my family.
translation.zh: 你还是我的家人

translation.en: [sobs] And you're mine.
translation.zh: 你也是我的家人

translation.en: I couldn't imagine going through this life or any other without you.
translation.zh: 我无法想象在没有你的陪伴下度过我的人生或来世

translation.en: ♪ I may not always love you ♪
translation.zh: 或许我不能每时每刻都爱着你

translation.en: ♪ But as long as there are… ♪
translation.zh: 但只要还有…

translation.en: Wait, that's it.
translation.zh: 等等 就是这首

translation.en: That's the song he would always sing to me as a kid.
translation.zh: 我小时候他总唱给我听的就是这首歌

translation.en: ♪ You never need to doubt it ♪
translation.zh: 你永远也不用去怀疑

translation.en: ♪ I'll make you so sure about it ♪
translation.zh: 我会让你对此确信

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause God only knows What I'd be without you ♪
translation.zh: 因为只有上帝知道没有你我会是个什么样

translation.en: He can't hear me.
translation.zh: 他听不到你

translation.en: Hey, we'll do this together, okay?
translation.zh: 嘿 我们一起唱吧 好吗？

translation.en: ♪ If you should ever leave me ♪
translation.zh: 要是有一天你离开我

translation.en: ♪ Though life would still go on Believe me ♪
translation.zh: 生活会继续向前 相信我

translation.en: [Lisa and Cassie] ♪ The world could show nothing to me ♪
translation.zh: 我对这个世界便再无可恋

translation.en: ♪ So what good would living do me? ♪
translation.zh: 那么活着对我来说有又何意义？

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause God only knows What I'd be without you ♪
translation.zh: 因为只有上帝知道没有你我会是个什么样

translation.en: ♪ God only knows what I'd be without you ♪
translation.zh: 只有上帝知道没有你我会是个什么样

translation.en: I'm not afraid to go anymore, Dad.
translation.zh: 我不再害怕离去了 爸

translation.en: I love you, pumpkin.
translation.zh: 我爱你 小南瓜

translation.en: I love you too, Dad.
translation.zh: 我也爱你 爸

translation.en: I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我得走了

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: You're cutting it a bit close.
translation.zh: 你这时间也掐得太准了

translation.en: I always like to be the last one to leave a party.
translation.zh: 我总喜欢最后一个离开派对

translation.en: Wait, please. I have to find one last thing.
translation.zh: 等等 求你了我还得去找最后一样东西

translation.en: We have to be back before time runs out. You don't want to tempt fate.
translation.zh: 我们必须在时间结束前回去 玩弄命运是不会有好下场的

translation.en: -It's important. It's for Lisa. -Cassie!
translation.zh: -这事很重要 是为了丽莎-凯茜！

translation.en: [Cassie gasps] There it is!
translation.zh: 在这里！

translation.en: I found it! The final piece. The list is complete.
translation.zh: 我找到了！最后一块 名单完成了

translation.en: -What's that look? -Your time is up.
translation.zh: -你这是什么表情？-你的时间到了

translation.en: Happy birthday, Cassie.
translation.zh: 生日快乐 凯茜

translation.en: -What did they decide? -Well, you missed your deadline.
translation.zh: -他们怎么决定的？-你错过了最后的期限

translation.en: There's no getting around that.
translation.zh: 这点怎么也没办法改变了

translation.en: We also broke the rules by going off the list.
translation.zh: 我们还违反了规定找了名单之外的人

translation.en: However, you did those things in good faith.
translation.zh: 可是呢 你做的这些都是出于善意

translation.en: The fact you'd risk your afterlife to help someone not on your list
translation.zh: 你冒着危及身后事的风险去帮助名单之外的人

translation.en: and take full responsibility to protect me,
translation.zh: 并且一人承担所有责任来保护我

translation.en: well, I mean, it's just… it's beyond selfless.
translation.zh: 这实在是太无私了

translation.en: So you're not in trouble?
translation.zh: 那你没有麻烦了吧？

translation.en: Even better.
translation.zh: 不止如此

translation.en: Thanks to your testimony,
translation.zh: 多亏了你的证言

translation.en: I've been promoted.
translation.zh: 我升职了

translation.en: [screams] You have? Val, that's amazing!
translation.zh: 真的吗？瓦尔 太棒了！

translation.en: I know! [laughs]
translation.zh: 可不是嘛！

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: I'm afraid to ask, but…
translation.zh: 我不敢问 可是…

translation.en: what about me?
translation.zh: 那我呢？

translation.en: It's time to find out.
translation.zh: 很快就知道了

translation.en: And for my last job…
translation.zh: 这是我最后一次了

translation.en: [sobs] I'm gonna miss you, Val.
translation.zh: 我会想念你的 瓦尔

translation.en: The world is a better place with you watching over it.
translation.zh: 有了你的看护 这个世界会更美好的

translation.en: I was your favorite, wasn't I?
translation.zh: 我是你的最爱 对吧？

translation.en: Cassie,
translation.zh: 凯茜

translation.en: you know I don't pick favorites.
translation.zh: 你知道我不能有偏爱的

translation.en: -[chimes] -[both exclaim]
-We did it! -No, you did it.
translation.zh: -我们成功了！-不 你成功了

translation.en: The Above is waiting.
translation.zh: 上面正在等你呢

translation.en: [mouthing] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Going up?
translation.zh: 上去吗？

translation.en: Okay, I have to address the elephant in the elevator.
translation.zh: 好吧 我必须先把事情挑明了

translation.en: -Muzak, really? -You're Kooper Keene!
translation.zh: -木扎克 真的？-你是库普·基恩

translation.en: I think it's meant as a compliment since we're both in here together.
translation.zh: 这应该是褒奖吧我们俩一起在往上去

translation.en: We're here together?
translation.zh: 我们俩一起在往上去？

translation.en: Like, how can this be real? Is this real? Are you real?
translation.zh: 这怎么可能是真的啊？这是真的吗？你是真的吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes, I am.
translation.zh: 嗯 是真的

translation.en: It's nice to meet you, Cassie.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你 凯茜

translation.en: You know my name? [laughs]
translation.zh: 你知道我的名字？

translation.en: How? Why?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Funny story.
translation.zh: 说来话长

translation.en: I was volunteering in a disaster relief area
translation.zh: 当时我正在受灾区做义工

translation.en: when disaster struck again.
translation.zh: 结果又出了事故

translation.en: I was able to save a few people, but I didn't make it.
translation.zh: 我成功地救下了几个人但自己没活下来

translation.en: I am so sorry. There's worse ways to go.
translation.zh: -真抱歉-更糟糕的死法多着呢

translation.en: Yeah, there sure are.
translation.zh: 是啊 确实如此

translation.en: Val was in the angel committee that sent me straight up.
translation.zh: 瓦尔是天使委员会的成员她直接送我上来了

translation.en: She said that we were supposed to meet.
translation.zh: 她说我们要在这里见面

translation.en: This is gonna sound really weird,
translation.zh: 这话听起来会很奇怪

translation.en: um, but I feel like I've always known you.
translation.zh: 可我觉得我认识你好久了

translation.en: So do I. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: What now?
translation.zh: 接下来呢？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: I've never been dead before.
translation.zh: 我还从来没死过呢

translation.en: Shall we do this?
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: [Cassie] Let's do this.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: [mouthing] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: ♪ What brings you up Can only leave you low ♪ ♪ I lie awake and wonder where I'll go ♪ ♪ In the unknown ♪
translation.zh: （谨此缅怀亨利·德·维利耶斯）
